title: SME-MBA || AI for Healthcare Professionals
description:
**Job description**  
We are looking for US based SMEs for one of our leading USA based online University, to take part in content creation for the for the following course:  
**Topic Name -** AI for Healthcare Professionals  
**Course** -AI for Healthcare Professionals  
**Project Start Date** - 8th March 24  
**Project End Date** - 30th April 2024  
**Efforts required**- 22-24 hours per course of 1 hour, spread across 2-3 weeks

**Candidates should have a mix of academic and corporate experience and practical application of the skill should be highlighted. The skill should be a core in the resumes**.

**Roles and Responsibilities for an SME (Subject Matter Expert):**  
**Recommending List of Courses for the Program:**  
● Evaluate the current industry needs and trends in project management.  
● Recommend a comprehensive list of courses that cover all the essential areas of  
project management, ensuring the program is comprehensive and aligned with  
industry needs.  
**Creation of Program Outline:**  
● Develop a detailed program outline that includes the list of recommended courses, the  
order in which they should be taken, program competency statements and, program  
outcomes  
**Creation of Course Outline:**  
● For each course in the program, create a detailed course outline that includes the  
topics to be covered, the order in which they should be presented, and the learning  
objectives for each topic.  
**Reviewing Course Content:**  
● Review the content of each course to ensure it is accurate, up-to-date, and aligned  
with the course outline and learning objectives.  
● Identify any gaps in the content and recommend additional material to fill those gaps.  
**Providing Reference Sources for Content Writing:**  
● Provide a list of recommended reference sources (OER resources, articles, blogs,  
etc.) that can be used by content writers to develop the course material.  
**Ensuring Course Meets Industry and Client Standards:**  
● Ensure that the course content, learning objectives, and assessment methods meet  
the standards of the project management industry and the expectations of the clients.  
● Ensure that the course content prepares the learners adequately for any relevant  
certifications or examinations.  
**Regular Updates and Revisions:**  
● Regularly review and update the course content to ensure it remains relevant and  
aligned with the latest trends and developments in the project management industry.  
**Collaboration and Communication:**  
● Collaborate with other stakeholders such as content writers, instructional designers,  
and program coordinators to ensure the successful development and delivery of the  
program.  
● Communicate regularly with all stakeholders to provide updates on progress and to  
address any issues or concerns that may arise.  
Job Types: Part-time, Temporary  
Salary: $120-$125 per module  
Expected hours: 8 – 20 per week  
Work Location: Remote

Job Type: Part-time

Salary: $18.00 per week

Expected hours: 8 – 20 per week

Work Location: Remote

title: Coding and AI Quality Assurance Specialist
description:
**About****Independent Physicians Resource, Inc (ApolloMD)**


IPR (ApolloMD) is a privately held, physician and APC operated multispecialty practice partnering with top hospitals, teaching facilities and health systems across the country. With 40 years of experience in emergency medicine, hospital medicine, anesthesia and radiology, ApolloMD has grown into one of the most successful firms in the practice management services industry, treating millions of patients each year. ApolloMD has held firm to the principles that are the foundation of its success. Read more about us: www.apollomd.com

 **Description**


This position will be responsible for identifying and analyzing coding errors, both human and AI-generated, to improve the accuracy and efficiency of our medical coding processes. This individual will contribute to the enhancement of coding quality and compliance and enable the continued and improved usage of AI in the coding process. This is a remote position with minimal travel.

 **Essential Responsibilities**

* Work closely with the Documentation Review Team to identify opportunities for improvement in coding.
* Use an Audit Dashboard to identify discrepancies between AI coding and human audits.
* Utilize expertise and knowledge of coding guidelines, regulations, and industry standards to assess accuracy.
* Stay up to date on changes/updates in coding guidelines and regulations, as well as technology advancements in AI
* Make recommendations for updates to processes improvement and workflows.
* Attend virtual meetings with internal team and AI coding partner.
* Minimum travel (1 – 2 times per year).

**Required Education and Skills**

* CPC (Certified Professional Coder), CCA (Certified Coding Associate), and/or CBCS (Certified Billing and Coding Specialist) certification required.
* Minimum of three years of EM coding experience required.
* Proficient in Microsoft Office Suite.
* Drive to improve AI as a resource for medical coding.
* Great analytical skills.
* Positive attitude.
* At least 3 years of ED coding experience.

**Benefits (include, but not limited to):**

* Discretional Vacation
* Full Health Benefit Package
* Generous Employer Contribution to Health Spending Account
* 401(k) with employer contribution
* Employee Assistance Program
* Voluntary Short Term/Long Term Disability
* Wellness Program
* Company Paid Life Insurance

 *Independent**Physicians**Resource,**Inc.**is committed to the principles of equal employment opportunity and strives to avoid all discrimination. All qualified employees and applicants are entitled to equal opportunities and treatment regardless of race, national origin, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, age, or physical or mental disability (subject to the ability to perform essential functions of the job).*

title: Digital Marketing Specialist
description:
**Company Information**Global TekMed Holdings is a conglomerate of industry-leading businesses spanning multiple markets, including Sales, Marketing,
IT, Management, Accounting, and more. Our primary focus is creating B2B and B2C products and services supporting the military veteran community.
At Global TekMed, you will have the opportunity to work in a collaborative environment with high growth opportunities. We are looking for a talented digital marketer to generate high-converting content and campaigns across multiple brands that support the military Veteran community. Come be a part of something great!
**Position Overview**
The Digital Marketing Specialist is a full-time position within our Marketing Department. This position is responsible for creating and executing the team’s email marketing, basic graphic design, updating websites, social media, copywriting, video content, and more. The role requires someone self-motivated and detail-oriented with an innovative attitude and can balance several tasks to help enhance our digital marketing platforms as a vital communication tool for our customers. Having an understanding or having previous marketing experience within the military and Veterans demographic is a plus.
This position will report to the Senior Marketing Specialist and the candidate will adhere to the team’s brand strategy and guidelines when developing content for all digital platforms and assisting in the management of assigned digital media responsibilities.
Applicants must include a link or documents that highlight some of their experience.
**Locations:** Remote US Only (Candidates must reside within the US)
**Job Type:** Full-time (40 hours per week). May require additional hours, evenings, and/or weekend work.  


**Essential Functions**
* Collaborate with marketing and leadership to deliver key business goals through web and graphic content (including graphic design, digital marketing promotions, lead generation efforts, and generating marketing qualified leads), digital marketing, and internal communications.
* Create and support campaigns executed through marketing platforms with multichannel tactics, including emails, SMS, social, and other digital channels.
* Write and edit content for multichannel distribution, including website, email, print, social, digital signage, video, and more. Produce relevant content that adheres to brand standards and messaging guidelines and can utilize our AI content development tools. Content development includes some of the following:
* Produce and develop email communication design and content, tracking, and follow-up reporting in SendGrid.
* Produce content for social media sites including Facebook, Instagram, YouTube, etc.
* Graphic Design – Use Adobe Creative Suite or Canva to generate digital banner ads and imagery aligned with brand style guidelines.
* Copywriting – Write preliminary website, social, and email marketing content to promote brand awareness and calls to action that align with customer values.
* Other duties as assigned.

**Work Experience**
* Minimum of 2-3 years of experience working directly for a brand or within an agency.
* Must be self-directed, detail-oriented, and can organize and schedule work effectively to meet deadlines.
* Ability to communicate effectively across all departments and externally.
* Ability to work both independently and the desire to learn more as we grow.
* Ability to multitask and re-prioritize assignments appropriately, while maintaining an ability to juggle numerous projects simultaneously.
* Photography or video experience a plus
* A basic understanding of Adobe Creative Suite or Canva is preferred.
* Immersed in social networks (Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, YouTube, and others)
* Strong visual eye for social media graphics, photography, videos, copy, etc.
* Strong understanding of social media best practices and social platforms
* Intense passion for helping us grow digital marketing aspects of the business.
* Strong attention to detail, grammar, and proofreading skills.
* A proactive attitude and strong time management skills delivering to meet deadlines.
* Solutions-oriented approach to work and possesses a strong willingness to venture into the unknown, experiment, and work collaboratively.
* Customer services skills


**Preferred Qualifications**
* Experience with SendGrid, Canva, Jasper AI, Adobe, and other digital marketing platforms.
* A degree in marketing, communications, or graphic design, is preferred but not required.
* Veterans and Military experience are also welcome.
* An understanding of military culture and language, vocabulary, and jargon used to market to Veterans is a bonus.


**Benefits**
401(k) Plan
Medical Insurance
Private Gym
Paid Holidays
Paid Time off
*Global TekMed Holdings is an equal-opportunity employer. All applicants will be considered for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability, marital status, veteran status, or any other applicable legally protected status or characteristic.*

title: Product Marketing Specialist
description:
**Product Marketing Specialist**
**Delivering Growth!**
Delivering growth for marketers is what NaviStone is all about. For B2C brands in considered-purchase verticals, we deliver proven, time-tested results. The NaviStone platform empowers marketers by finding, activating, and converting lucrative audiences, with incredible impact!
**The Challenge**
NaviStone is on a mission! We’re moving fast, doubling the size of our business over the next 2 years. As our Product Expert, joining our product management team, you will play a crucial role in bridging the gap between the technical aspects of NaviStone products and the overall business.
**What You’ll Do**
* **Drive product adoption** based on your deep expertise in our product and technology to provide support throughout the organization including marketing, sales and client services.
* **Develop and manage issue escalation and resolution** when new products are not performing as intended.
* **Collaborate with product managers and development teams -** Collaborate **to** understand product roadmaps and upcoming features and translate technical details into customer-facing benefits.
* **Collaborate with cross-functional teams to develop and execute go-to-market plans** for new product launches and updates.
* **Identify and highlight key features** and benefits that resonate with the target audience.
* **Conducting market research** to understand customer needs, industry trends, and a competitive landscape.
* **Partner with Sales -** You will work closely with the sales team to provide them with the necessary tools and resources to effectively sell our products.
* **Assist the sales team-** Support and assist the sales team with questions about new products including but not limited to providing training materials and conducting training sessions.
* **Collaborate with marketing -** Provide input into the production of marketing collateral, including product documentation, case studies, whitepapers, and presentations.
* **Develop clear and compelling messaging** that communicates the value proposition of NaviStone’s product. You will need to ensure there is consistent messaging across all marketing materials.
* **Define target audiences** - Define target audience segments and tailor marketing strategies accordingly.
**What You Will Need to Succeed**
* You have a bachelor’s degree in marketing, computer science, business, or a related field
* You have at least 3-5 years of experience working as a product owner or product specialist with marketing technology and SaaS products
* You can work cross-functionally and manage simultaneous projects and needs
* You bring the ability to manage ambiguity, overcome challenges, and thrive
* You have a willingness to learn, collaborate, and get creative
* You have demonstrated Project Management skills
* You can effectively communicate with and relate to individuals at all levels within the organization and NaviStone customers
* You can effectively partner with teams of all sizes and composition
* You have a personality that thrives on digital innovation and evaluating trends in a changing landscape
***Develop your best you, and reinvigorate for what’s next***
*NaviStone’s benefits, programs, and perks are purpose-built to help you grow stronger professionally, and personally. We offer generous medical, dental, vision, and retirement benefits for you and your family.*
*We never stop growing, and we never stop learning. Want to explore AI? Develop new coding skills? Become a better presenter? Grow your leadership skills? Learn advanced yoga? We offer countless professional and personal development opportunities to fuel your ambitions.*
*We’re a Rocketship, but even Rocketships need rest! We work hard, and we go fast. But we also recharge! With unlimited vacation, a generous number of paid holidays, and fun employee events throughout the year, you can refuel and reinvigorate for the incredible journey ahead!*

title: Tribal Billing Specialist - International/Tribal Online Division - Grand Canyon University (Remote)
description:
Come Grow With Us  

Grand Canyon Education (GCE) is a rapidly growing educational service company that has long been an industry leader in providing educational, operational and technological support services to the post-secondary education sector. Formerly part of Grand Canyon University (GCU), GCE still works closely with GCU to benefit thousands of students, families and the local inner-city community. We put people first, drive innovation, and do good in the community that we live and work in.
Join us at Grand Canyon Education and begin your career helping Grand Canyon University students succeed! We are looking for a motivated University Billing Specialist supporting our tribal team for our international/tribal division - responsible for compiling data and preparing invoices and bills. Starting salary is $38,000 per year.
Must reside in or near Maricopa County, AZ. New hire training will encompass three full weeks of training. One week will be held in-person at our Phoenix, AZ campus, and the following two weeks will be held virtually via Zoom.
Who you are:
You’re an energetic goal-getter with a team spirit, who is passionate about the power of education. You’re driven, self-motivated and empathetic and have demonstrated success in building relationships, meeting expectations/deadlines, providing excellent service, and multitasking.
You know it’s not all about achieving (and often crushing!) your goals. While that does get you excited, what you really thrive on is using your exceptional communication and coaching skills to help non-traditional Grand Canyon University students’ level up in their lives through a quality education.
Now is the time to bring your talent to Grand Canyon Education, where you’ll have the opportunity to play an integral role in providing for Grand Canyon University online students. Here’s a taste of how you’ll make your mark as a Tribal Billing Specialist with us.
What you will do:* Reconcile rosters and invoices to ensure accurate billing.
* Create standard invoices and follow receivables for all students with corporate sponsorship.
* Maintain professional relationships with students and external government agency contacts
* Use appropriate systems e.g., WAWF, AI portal and Goarmyed portal to bill Tuition assistance
* Reconcile the VA once for all certification of GI funding which includes adding and deleting student accounts with the appropriate student system
* Complete daily DOD processing, VA mail processing, and TA grade reporting,
* Responsible for team audits and compliance oversight.
* Responsible for ROTC training process.
* Complete military invoicing, One Branch
* Administer TA Degree plans
* Responsible for completing VA Graduation Reporting
* Responsible for completing the VA Certificate of Eligibility
* Work with Student Accounting
* Monitor program of study
* Complete statement of fees.
* Other duties as assigned.


What you will have:* Minimum experience of 2 years in collections or customer billing environment.
* Bachelor’s degree from a regionally accredited four-year college or university
* 6 months professional experience in higher education customer billing function.
* VA certification, invoicing government agencies or military experience preferred.
* Cannot be in default on a federal student loan which is verified through pre-employment background check.


What we’ll offer in return:* A career where your work makes a difference.
* A stable income with a good salary.
* Opportunity to own your part of the business without the risks of owning your own business.
* Ongoing professional development and growth.
* Outstanding benefits and work perks.
* Collaborative and supportive work environment....and more!

title: Senior Software Engineer - AI/ML
description:
**Do you ever wonder what happens inside the cloud?**
-----------------------------------------------------



DigitalOcean (NYSE: DOCN) simplifies cloud computing so builders can spend more time creating software that changes the world. With our mission-critical infrastructure and fully managed offerings, DigitalOcean enables startups and small and medium-sized businesses (SMBs) to rapidly deploy and scale modern applications. As a remote-first organization, our employees, like our customers, are based around the world.


**We want people who are passionate about taking complex concepts and providing a simple and accessible experience for users.**
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------



We are looking for a Senior Software Engineer - AI/ML to build features and improvements end to end to make accelerated compute simple and accessible for everyone.



The Paperspace team is responsible for creating tools so that developers can easily create and deploy models for AI experiences. We currently manage the following products: Notebooks, Workflows, and Model Deployments. We're a fast-pace team looking to build the next generation of AI/ML workflows on top of DigitalOcean's cloud.


**What You'll Be Doing:**
-------------------------


* Work primarily in Typescript, React, GraphQL, TRPC, and Go
* Build UI components, libraries, tools, and services that power the Paperspace platform
* Maintain and develop the GraphQL/TRPC api
* Collaborate on design and UX
* Ship product features from planning to launch to maintenance with high autonomy
* Collaborate with other engineers to find elegant architectures and solutions

**What You'll Add to DigitalOcean:**
------------------------------------


* Own a technical area by providing technical leadership for a team
* Strong interest in development platforms, MLOps, AI, CI/CD, infrastructure or making products for technical teams
* Able to make effective trade-offs in regards to both engineering and product requirements, while balancing short term and long term needs
* 8+ years minimum of relevant related industry experience in a fast-paced, high growth tech environment building UI component libraries, design systems, and tools using TypeScript
* Demonstrated design and UX sensibilities
* Knowledge of API standards including REST or GraphQL or RPC

**Why You'll Like Working for DigitalOcean:**
---------------------------------------------


* **We reward our employees**. The base salary range for this position is between $128,00.00 - $170,000.00 based on relevant years of experience and skills. The salary range for this role is specific to candidates located within the U.S. and will vary for candidates outside the U.S.. Employees may qualify for a bonus in addition to base salary; bonus amounts are determined based on company and individual performance. We also provide equity compensation to eligible employees including grants of equity upon hire and the option to participate in our Employee Stock Purchase Program.
* **We value development.** You will work with some of the smartest and most interesting people in the industry. We are a high-performance organization that is always challenging our teams and employees to continuously grow. We maintain a growth mindset in everything we do and invest deeply in employee development through formalized mentorship and other internal programs. We provide all employees with reimbursement for relevant conferences, training, and education.
* **We care about your well-being.** In addition to cash and equity compensation, we also offer employees a competitive array of benefits. While the philosophy around our benefits is the same worldwide, specific benefits may vary in other countries due to local regulations and preferences.
* **We value diversity and inclusivity.** We are an equal-opportunity employer and we do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.


* This is a remote role

  

#LI-Remote

title: Digital Content Specialist
description:
**About Us:**


Blue Mountain, a pioneer in Life Sciences Asset Management for over 30 years, holds a unique position in the industry with a proven legacy. Founded in 1989, Blue Mountain offers a comprehensive, integrated solution, assisting numerous Pharmaceutical, Biotech, Cell and Gene Therapy, Medical Device, and Contract Manufacturing companies. From initial set-up to installation, from training to validation, our company empowers life sciences companies to excel in GMP asset management by implementing our best-in-class software. This enables them to harness the power of the cloud, embrace paperless processes, and ensure strict regulatory compliance.


Blue Mountain's ultimate mission is to support regulated companies in introducing new, safe, and effective therapies to the market. Achieving this requires intricate processes and products that adhere to the highest industry standards.

**Digital Content Specialist:**

Are you a creative and ambitious individual eager to advance your career as a Digital Content Specialist in a growing tech company? We are seeking a dynamic and results-driven professional with 2-5years of marketing experience to join our team and lead our digital content strategy. This role offers a unique opportunity to make a significant impact in a fast-paced B2B SaaS environment within the Life Sciences industry.

**Key Responsibilities:**

* Collaborate with subject matter experts (SMEs) to create and update marketing collateral, including but not limited to eBooks, blog posts, whitepapers, case studies, webinar slide decks, and infographics that target specific buyer personas and address pain points.
* Conduct keyword research, on-page SEO, and monitor organic search rankings to optimize website content for search engines.
* Create visually appealing content, such as graphics, infographics, and presentations, to enhance marketing materials.
* Develop and execute compelling social media content strategies to fuel demand generation campaigns and engage with our audience across various platforms.
* Assist in the creation and execution of email marketing campaigns, including writing compelling email copy and monitoring campaign performance.
* Embrace and scale the transformative power of AI tools in content creation, exploring innovative ways to leverage artificial intelligence for improved content quality and efficiency
* Analyze marketing data to evaluate the effectiveness of campaigns and make data-driven recommendations for improvements.
* Stay current with industry trends, competitor activity, and best practices in digital content marketing.

**Who You Are:**

* A proactive marketer who continuously seeks new, innovative ways to level up their marketing approach and delivery.
* An adventurous marketer, demonstrating a "can-do" spirit, and a strong desire for continuous learning and professional development
* Possesses a sharp design sense and adeptly utilizes tools such as Canva to craft visually captivating content that engages the audience.
* Basic understanding of SEO principles and digital marketing concepts.
* Familiarity with marketing tools and platforms such as HubSpot, WordPress, and Google Analytics.
* Ability to work both independently and collaboratively in a fast-paced environment.
* Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
* Attention to detail and strong organizational skills.


If you are a passionate and creative digital content specialist with 2-5 years of marketing experience ready to make a difference, we encourage you to apply and help drive our marketing efforts to new heights.

title: AI Machine Learning Developer - South East Asia
description:
**Opportunities:*** Competitive hourly rate: **AUD 35 - AUD 50 per hour (based on experience and location)**
* **Australian Time Zone**
* **Fully Remote - Work From Home**
* Opportunity to work on challenging and impactful projects
* Collaborative and supportive work environment
* Opportunities for professional development and growth

  

**About the Role:**  

  

As an AI Machine Learning Developer, you'll be at the forefront of innovation, designing and developing intelligent solutions powered by machine learning algorithms. You'll collaborate with a talented team to tackle challenging problems, analyze data, build predictive models, and implement them in real-world applications. This role demands strong technical skills, a sharp analytical mind, and a thirst for knowledge.  

  

This position is initially envisioned to be a part-time role, but may progress into a full-time role.  

  

**Your Responsibilities:*** Design, develop, and deploy machine learning models for various applications.
* Preprocess and analyze large datasets using various tools and techniques.
* Select and implement appropriate machine learning algorithms based on project requirements.
* Evaluate and optimize model performance to ensure accuracy and efficiency.
* Integrate machine learning models with existing systems and applications.
* Stay up-to-date with the latest advancements in the field of AI and machine learning.
* Collaborate with engineers, data scientists, and other stakeholders to deliver successful projects.

Document your work clearly and concisely.  
* 

**We're looking for someone who:*** Possesses 3+ years of experience as an AI Machine Learning Developer or similar role.
* Holds a strong understanding of machine learning concepts, algorithms, and techniques.
* Has experience with popular machine learning libraries and frameworks (e.g., TensorFlow, PyTorch, scikit-learn).
* Demonstrates proficiency in programming languages like Python.
* Possesses excellent data analysis and manipulation skills.
* Is a problem-solver with a critical and analytical mind.
* Thrives in a collaborative and fast-paced environment.
* Enjoys taking initiative and working independently.
* Has excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
* Has a passion for learning and staying ahead of the technology curve.

title: Partnership Specialist (Remote)
description:
**Company Description** **About Us**


Health Evolution brings together a passionate community of chief executives, presidents, founders, board chairs, policymakers, and other top industry leaders. We engage our community by convening in-person gatherings, publishing insights, and analyzing information that helps industry leaders accelerate progress, develop opportunities, and shape new strategies. We support executives seeking to create a high-quality and efficient healthcare system based on prevention, affordability, access, equity, and outcomes for people and their communities. How do we do this? Health Evolution provides a comprehensive, strategic offering for organizations who want to engage Payer, Provider, and Life Sciences CEOs more effectively and frequently, to build relationships of long-lasting value. We do this through:

**The Health Evolution Forum: Leaders driving innovation, collaboration across health care sectors**


The Forum is a peer-to-peer collaboration among leaders across health care sectors focused on driving near-term impact. The Forum currently consists of ten Roundtables and 200+ fellows. The ten current Roundtables include the following:

* Integrated Home-Based Care Models
* Digital-Forward Consumer Experience
* Commercial Risk-Based Contracting
* Value-Based Care for Specialized Populations
* Data-Driven Health Equity Strategies
* Scalable Social Drivers of Health Solutions
* AI and Data-Powered Innovation
* Personalized Health Ecosystem
* Elevating Metal and Behavioral Health Care
* Confab for Advancing Women in Leadership
* Frontiers in Courageous Leadership

**Health Evolution Events:**

* **Health Evolution Summit: Setting the Agenda for North American Health Care.** Invitation-only retreat of the most influential cross sector CEOs from across the health care industry.
* **Health Evolution Connect: Emerging Best Practices.** A gathering of CEOs and C-Suite officers focused on implementing transformational strategies.

  

**Job Description** **About the Role**


Reporting to the department VP, the **Partnership Specialist** will be the backbone of the Payer, Provider, Life Sciences team. The Specialist will support sales by marketing/keeping salesforce up to date/pulling reports/ proposing ideas to generate sales business, create Fellowship invitations/ keep executives’ calendars organized to optimize revenue generation/keep BOX notes accurate and up-to-date.

**Key Performance Indicators Include:**

* Supports and works effectively with all team members within the Fellowship Partnership team to achieve/exceed revenue goals
* Owns an effective process that provides weekly updates for the sales team to accurately track progress against sales goals
* Prepares for weekly Pipeline meetings with data that allows sales leaders to effectively prioritize their time and focus
* Creates and maintains effective and accurate Salesforce dashboards and reports
* Makes sure Salesforce records are consistently up to date and accurate
* Assist the VP in supporting the team to achieve goals

**Key Functions Include:**

**Support, Documentation, Forecasting**

* Manage pipelines in Salesforce to accurately record progress; track against agreed upon goals, and forecast effectively
* Develop strong prospect and target lists within salesforce across multiple products – Forum, events, media programs, etc.
* Ensure that all sales activity is tracked effectively within Salesforce and within Box – for example taking notes on calls, organizing notes effectively in Box, and linking those notes within salesforce
* Create and maintain Salesforce dashboards and reports, as it relates to sales against goals and effective forecasting. Report weekly
* Manage Fellowship invitation and contract process – develop proposals and contracts as needed, working in conjunction with accounting on invoicing and tracking unpaid invoices
* Maintain organization of business development and Fellowship related materials and information
* Maintain client database in Salesforce so that sponsor records and contacts are continually up to date

**Strategy**

* Collaborate with the team to develop an effective go-to-market sales strategy for each product/event
* In collaboration with the team, research and identify new sponsor prospects that make sense for Health Evolution

**Communication**

* Assist with call scheduling for VP as needed
* Attend and take notes on Business Development calls. Link box notes to salesforce effectively.
* As needed, create Fellowship communications for both prospects and current sponsors across all lines of business
* Manage process to service incoming leads and potential sponsors effectively

**Additional Areas of Support**

* Help maintain a strong, fun, inclusive office culture including celebrations and team outings
* Help the team to prepare for in person events and be available to help onsite at these events as needed

 **What You Will Need to Be Successful**

* A Bachelor’s degree in a business-related field, or equivalent work experience
* 1 year of sales, account management, or administrative experience
* Ability to learn how different healthcare sectors work together
* Ability to ideate successful marketing and sales strategies
* Strong experience with Salesforce and reporting
* Fluency with virtual meeting platforms, such as Zoom, Microsoft Teams, etc.
* Ability to map the marketing and sales enablement needs of any Health Evolution client

 **Interpersonal Skills**

* Attention to detail
* Self-directed and resourceful
* Excellent organizational skills
* Cogent and service-forward communication, both written and verbal
* Collaborative Team Player
* Customer-focused
* Strategic mindset

 **Benefits Overview**


Our talent anywhere philosophy allows employees the flexibility to work virtually on an as needed or permanent basis.


Competitive salary plus incentives


Competitive, comprehensive health care coverage.


Generous paid time off, including time off to volunteer


401K Match

  



  

  

**Qualifications** **What You Will Need to Be Successful**

* A Bachelor’s degree in a business-related field, or equivalent work experience
* 1 year of sales, account management, or administrative experience
* Ability to learn how different healthcare sectors work together
* Ability to ideate successful marketing and sales strategies
* Strong experience with Salesforce and reporting
* Fluency with virtual meeting platforms, such as Zoom, Microsoft Teams, etc.
* Ability to map the marketing and sales enablement needs of any Health Evolution client

**Interpersonal Skills**

* Attention to detail
* Self-directed and resourceful
* Excellent organizational skills
* Cogent and service-forward communication, both written and verbal
* Collaborative Team Player
* Customer-focused
* Strategic mindset

  

**Additional Information** **Benefits**

* Ability to work remotely
* Competitive compensation
* Competitive, comprehensive health care coverage.
* Generous paid time off
* 401k w/company match


Health Evolution is an equal opportunity employer. All applicants will be considered for employment without attention to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, veteran or disability status.

title: Subrogation Specialist I - Healthcare
description:
Company Overview and Culture
  
**EXL (NASDAQ:** EXLS) is a global analytics and digital solutions company that partners with clients to improve business outcomes and unlock growth. Bringing together deep domain expertise with robust data, powerful analytics, cloud, and AI, we create agile, scalable solutions and execute complex operations for the world’s leading corporations in industries including insurance, healthcare, banking and financial services, media, and retail, among others. Focused on creating value from data for driving faster decision-making and transforming operating models, EXL was founded on the core values of innovation, collaboration, excellence, integrity and respect. Headquartered in New York, our team is over 40,000 strong, with more than 50 offices spanning six continents. For information, visit www.exlservice.com.
  
  

For the past 20 years, EXL has worked as a strategic partner and won awards in its approach to helping its clients solve business challenges such as digital transformation, improving customer experience, streamlining business operations, taking products to market faster, improving corporate finance, building models to become compliant more quickly with new regulations, turning volumes of data into business opportunities, creating new channels for growth and better adapting to change. The business operates within four business units: Insurance, Health, Analytics, and Emerging businesses.
  
  

About EXL Health
  
We leverage Human Ingenuity and domain expertise to help clients improve outcomes, optimize revenue and maximize profitability across the healthcare ecosystem. Technology, data and analytics are at the heart of our solutions. We collaborate closely with clients to transform how care is delivered, managed and paid.
  
  

EXL Health combines deep domain expertise with analytic insights and technology-enabled services to transform how care is delivered, managed, and paid. Leveraging Human Ingenuity, we collaborate with our clients to solve complex problems and enhance their performance with nimble, scalable solutions. With data on more than 260 million lives, we work with hundreds of organizations across the healthcare ecosystem.
  
  

We help payers improve member care quality and network performance, manage population risk, and optimize revenue while decreasing administrative waste and reducing health claim expenditures. We help Pharmacy Benefit Managers (PBMs) manage member drug benefits and reduce drug spending while maintaining quality. We help provider organizations proactively manage risk, improve outcomes, and optimize network performance. We provide Life Sciences companies with enriched data, insights through advanced analytics and data visualization tools to get the right treatment to the right patient at the right time.
  
  

EXL is looking for a Subrogation Specialist I. This is a Remote Full-time opportunity.
  
This position requires the Subrogation Specialist to process a paperless health insurance subrogation caseload by investigating potential cases and pursuing med-pay, no-fault, liability, and workers’ compensation recoveries.
  
Responsibilities include investigating new potentials cases, placing outbound calls as well as submitting correspondence to health plan members, insurance companies, and attorney offices. The Subrogation Specialist coordinates efforts with other members of the subrogation team to maximize recovery in accordance with EXL’s Subrogation Policies and Procedures.
  
Complying with HIPAA regulations as well as EXL’s HIPAA and Information Security policies and procedures, including required training and incident reporting.
  
  

**Key Responsibilities & Job Function:**  

* Learn and understand fundamentals of health insurance subrogation, including basic health plan contractual provisions that apply to the reimbursement efforts.
* Review, Identify and develop subrogation opportunities by gathering missing information and potential sources of recovery.
* Place parties of interest on notice
* Organize and structure investigations to work in priority order using the tools provided.
* Respond timely to all electronic, written, and verbal communications.
* Log and maintain detailed and accurate records.
* Access and pull benefits from clients’ health claim systems.
* Pursue worker’s compensation, third party liability, first party uninsured and underinsured recovery, worker’s compensation, med-pay coverage, and no-fault recoveries.
* Engage advice and/or help of legal manager to proactively resolve cases.
* Ensure compliance of state and federal laws
* Adhere to settlement authority levels.
* Maintain department productivity and quality standards.
* Sensitivity to privacy in accordance with HIPAA guidelines


**Required Skills:**  

* Working knowledge of Microsoft Word, Excel, internet research skills
* Developed customer service skills.
* Strong organizational and time management skills
* Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
* High School or equivalent education level


**Experience:**  

* Subrogation: 1 year (Preferred)
* claims: 1 year (Preferred)
* heavy call volume: 1 year (Preferred)


**What We Offer:**  

* EXL Health offers an exciting, fast paced, and innovative environment, which brings together a group of sharp and entrepreneurial professionals who are eager to influence business decisions.
* From your very first day, you get an opportunity to work closely with highly experienced, world class Healthcare consultants.
* You can expect to learn many aspects of businesses that our clients engage in. You will also learn effective teamwork and time-management skills - key aspects for personal and professional growth.
* We provide guidance/ coaching to every employee through our mentoring program wherein every junior level employee is assigned a senior level professional as advisors.
* Sky is the limit for our team members. The unique experiences gathered at EXL Health sets the stage for further growth and development in our company and beyond.


EEO/Minorities/Females/Vets/Disabilities
  
  

To view our total rewards offered click here — > https://www.exlservice.com/us-careers-and-benefits
  
  

**Base Salary Range Disclaimer:** The base salary range represents the low and high end of the EXL base salary range for this position. Actual salaries will vary depending on factors including but not limited to: location and experience. The base salary range listed is just one component of EXL's total compensation package for employees. Other rewards may include bonuses, as well as a Paid Time Off policy, and many region specific benefits.
  
  

Please also note that the data shared through the job application will be stored and processed by EXL in accordance with the EXL Privacy Policy.
  
  

Application & Interview Impersonation Warning – Purposely impersonating another individual when applying and / or participating in an interview in order to obtain employment with EXL Service Holdings, Inc. (the “Company”) for yourself or for the other individual is a crime. We have implemented measures to deter and to uncover such unlawful conduct. If the Company identifies such fraudulent conduct, it will result in, as applicable, the application being rejected, an offer (if made) being rescinded, or termination of employment as well as possible legal action against the impersonator(s).
  
  

EXL may use artificial intelligence to create insights on how your candidate information matches the requirements of the job for which you applied. While AI may be used in the recruiting process, all final decisions in the recruiting and hiring process will be taken by the recruiting and hiring teams after considering a candidate’s full profile. As a candidate, you can choose to opt out of this artificial intelligence screening process. Your decision to opt out will not negatively impact your opportunity for employment with EXL.

title: Operations Executive - Subrogation Specialist I
description:
Company Overview and Culture
  
**EXL (NASDAQ:** EXLS) is a global analytics and digital solutions company that partners with clients to improve business outcomes and unlock growth. Bringing together deep domain expertise with robust data, powerful analytics, cloud, and AI, we create agile, scalable solutions and execute complex operations for the world’s leading corporations in industries including insurance, healthcare, banking and financial services, media, and retail, among others. * Linking Documents to files
* Monitoring the case type to assign to proper representative.
* Review and understanding of incoming funds and the process of applying funds to a case.
* Understanding of proprietary closing codes.


**Required Skills:**  

* Working knowledge of Microsoft Word, Excel, internet research skills.
* Organizational and time management skills.
* Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
* High School or equivalent education level requires (Associates degree preferred)
* Ability to communicate effectively.
* Attention to detail.


**Experience:**  

* Subrogation: 1 year (Preferred but not required)
* Intermediate computer knowledge
* Basic understanding of accounts receivable.


**What We Offer:**  

* EXL Health offers an exciting, fast paced, and innovative environment, which brings together a group of sharp and entrepreneurial professionals who are eager to influence business decisions. From your very first day, you get an opportunity to work closely with highly experienced, world class Healthcare consultants.
* You can expect to learn many aspects of businesses that our clients engage in. You will also learn effective teamwork and time-management skills - key aspects for personal and professional growth.
* We provide guidance/ coaching to every employee through our mentoring program wherein every junior level employee is assigned a senior level professional as advisors.
* Sky is the limit for our team members. The unique experiences gathered at EXL Health sets the stage for further growth and development in our company and beyond.
* Benefits we offer are Healthcare, Vision, Dental and 401k options.


EEO/Minorities/Females/Vets/Disabilities
  
  

To view our total rewards offered click here — > https://www.exlservice.com/us-careers-and-benefits
  
  

**Base Salary Range Disclaimer:** The base salary range represents the low and high end of the EXL base salary range for this position. The base salary range listed is just one component of EXL's total compensation package for employees. title: Automation Specialist
description:
**Automation Specialist**

  

VersaFile Inc. is a Vancouver-based technology services and software company providing intelligent content and process automation solutions. This includes managed services, strategic consulting, implementations, and commercial software. Our purpose is to generate outcomes that make a difference by making our solutions easy, highly functional, and quick to value.

  

We are looking for an Automation Specialist to build high-performing robotic process automation solutions in various technologies, including UI Path, Kofax RPA (Kapow) and Automation Anywhere. As an Automation Specialist, you will be identifying requirements, creating functional specifications, developing, testing, and implementing process automation solutions for our clients.

  

Our ideal candidate is proactive, a quick learner, an excellent communicator, and can solve complex technical issues in a customer friendly and timely manner. Ideally, this person will have experience working in the healthcare industry.

  

This position is based in the US. Due to client requirements, the successful candidate must be a US citizen and be able to pass a US Background check.

 **What You'll Do:**


* Ensure best practices and consistent delivery approaches are utilized on assigned projects.
* Provide input to Project Managers on project planning and estimating efforts for each assigned project.
* Structure work and produce deliverables that align with the scope and budget of projects.
* Communicate the risks and benefits of design/architectural options to an audience with diverse technical backgrounds.
* Clarify and capture requirements for effective RPA solutions.
* Create and maintain solution and testing documentation.
* Analyze requirements, work with technical experts, and draw on their deep understanding of business processes to produce clear and concise process design documentation.
* Ensure that process automation is properly tested in both development and production environments.
* Support operationalizing automation solutions from production implementation phase to business-as-usual phase.
* Responsible for problem/issue resolution that arise in day to day running of automated processes, providing timely responses and solutions as required.
* Become an expert of the application and understand its advanced functionality.
* Possess a unique blend of technical, business, and people skills and continually develop and refine knowledge.

  


**Skills:**


* Ability to solve complex and ambiguous technical problems using experience, creativity, and sound judgment.
* Ability to work effectively in a team environment and independently.
* Demonstrated good judgment in making decisions.
* Ability to explain and defend technical decisions to a technical audience.
* Ability to understand and interpret complex technical documentation.
* Solid knowledge and experience using MS Office suite including Visio.
* Proven track record of delivering projects on time and within budget.

  


**Key Attributes and Qualifications:**


* BSc/BA or equivalent work experience
* 1+ years of industry experience in preferably the healthcare industry
* Nice to have:
	+ Experience with RPA tools, scripting and programming in languages such as: PowerShell, .NET, C#, Java.
	+ Demonstrated understanding of networking configuration Familiarity with Database queries and scripting.
* Passion for solving business problems with Automation and AI.
* Fluent in English and US Citizenship and ability to pass a US Background Check are pre-requisites.

  


**Location:**


* This is a remote position working out of the US.
  


**Type:**


* Full-time permanent
  


**To Apply:**


* Please submit your Cover Letter and Resume.
* Only those candidates who are eligible to work in the US prior to sending your application will be considered.
  


*We thank all applicants for their interest and we will contact you for an interview if you are short-listed as a candidate.*

title: Professional Services Consulting Expert
description:
Genesys empowers more than 7,500 organizations in over 100 countries to improve loyalty and business outcomes by creating the best experiences for customers and employees. Through Genesys Cloud, the #1 AI-powered experience orchestration platform, Genesys delivers the future of CX to organizations of all sizes so they can provide empathetic, personalized experiences at scale. As the trusted, all-in-one platform born in the cloud, Genesys Cloud accelerates growth for organizations by enabling them to differentiate with the right customer experience at the right time.
We employ more than 6,000 people across the globe who embrace empathy and cultivate collaboration to succeed. And, while we offer great benefits and perks like larger tech companies, our employees have the independence to make a larger impact on the company and take ownership of their work. Join the team and create the future of customer experience together.
The SS&AI (Self Service and Artificial Intelligence) Team is a Professional Services team responsible for the design, development and testing of highly customized Self-service IVR and AI driven Bot applications across all Genesys platforms. In this role, candidate will get exciting opportunities to work on the latest AI technologies to provide top class CX using inhouse Genesys bots as well as – Google, Amazon, Nuance etc. Services provided by the candidate will include software development and Architecture, Integration consulting, Agile leadership, team and project leading, customer training, team education and owning end to end delivery.
In this role, you will often be working closely with our customers (Business owners and technical SME’s), sales teams and internal Genesys Agile teams and must have superb interpersonal and communication skills, as well as the ability to work well within a fast-paced environment with tight deadlines. This role is a senior contributor with the ability to lead major self-service project efforts through presales, discovery, design, and development, and come up with IVR and bot solution architectures. The candidate should have both breadth and depth of technical knowledge and experience designing, architecting and delivering IVR and bots (voice and chat).
You will also get the opportunity to work with NLU models, AI-driven predictive routing, speech recognition, Generative AI, and IVR Applications built for Genesys Cloud solutions spanning DTMF through advanced speech and natural language applications with web service integration to 3rd party platforms. The goal of the role is always to provide the best customer experience for our customers and partners.
Responsibilities* Participate in presales and discovery process, leading the SS&AI team efforts to understand customer needs and help identify, document and estimate self-service solutions.
* Lead customer workshops to help design solutions using our products using awareness of Genesys and 3rd party product nuances.
* Create and maintain conversational design flows in alignment with customer expectations for intent detection, speech recognition, directed dialogue and hand off to agents.
* Present and demonstrate proposed IVR solutions as required. This includes presentation of flows, adjusting and updating logic as required. Perform knowledge transfer of the delivered solutions at the conclusion of the engagement as necessary.
* Maintain and keep up to date with changes in Genesys self-service technology and 3rd party bot platforms and associated AI technologies supported by professional services.
* Work with Genesys technical teams and business partners to design, develop and maintain Bots, IVRs and routing applications for speech interactions and chat interactions.
* Create accurate development effort estimates in collaboration with the sales team, sales engagement directors, team manager, Professional Services project managers or regional managers.
* Work as a team player to the organization. Providing feedback to the product organization about issues found in APIs, product, documentation or architectures.


Qualifications* Hands on experience with software development and Professional services projects in a technical capacity
* Proven ability to design and deliver enterprise AI bot applications which include intent detection, speech applications, routing and development experience in a variety of bot development tools,5 + Years of experience with bot development including voice bots.
* Practical experience designing, developing and deploying conversational IVR solutions in tools such as Genesys Architect, Dialog Engine, Google Dialogflow, Amazon Lex and Nuance Mix.
* Background implementing and deploying Conversational IVR and Conversational AI solutions.
* In depth understanding of the IVR and bot application architectures including web components, telephony, caching, prompt servers, ASR and operational diagnostics.


Familiarity with the following is a plus:* Experience with grammar development or working closely with speech scientists and with speech recognition engines.
* Software development experience using languages such as JavaScript, Python, PHP, Java or C#.
* GCP or AWS certification.
* Genesys Cloud certification.


Compensation:
This role has a market-competitive salary with an anticipated base compensation range listed below. Actual salaries will vary depending on a candidate’s experience, qualifications, skills, and location. This role might also be eligible for a commission or performance-based bonus opportunities.
$121,500.00 - $238,400.00
Benefits:* Medical, Dental, and Vision Insurance.
* Telehealth coverage
* Flexible work schedules and work from home opportunities
* Development and career growth opportunities
* Open Time Off in addition to 10 paid holidays
* 401(k) matching program
* Adoption Assistance
* Fertility treatments


More details about our company benefits can be found at the following link: https://mygenesysbenefits.com
If a Genesys employee referred you, please use the link they sent you to apply.
About Genesys:
Every year, Genesys orchestrates billions of remarkable customer experiences for organizations in more than 100 countries. Through the power of our cloud, digital and AI technologies, organizations can realize Experience as a Service™ our vision for empathetic customer experiences at scale. With Genesys, organizations have the power to deliver proactive, predictive, and hyper personalized experiences to deepen their customer connection across every marketing, sales, and service moment on any channel, while also improving employee productivity and engagement. By transforming back-office technology to a modern revenue velocity engine Genesys enables true intimacy at scale to foster customer trust and loyalty. Visit www.genesys.com.
Reasonable Accommodations:
If you require a reasonable accommodation to complete any part of the application process or are limited in the ability or unable to access or use this online application process and need an alternative method for applying, you or someone you know may complete the Reasonable Accommodations Form for assistance. Please use the Candidate field in the dropdown menu to ensure a timely response.
This form is designed to assist job seekers who seek reasonable accommodation for the application process. Submissions entered for non-accommodation-related issues, such as following up on an application or submitting a resume, may not receive a response.
Genesys is an equal opportunity employer committed to equity in the workplace. We evaluate qualified applicants without regard to race, color, age, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, marital status, domestic partner status, national origin, genetics, disability, military and veteran status, and other protected characteristics.*Please note that recruiters will never ask for sensitive personal or financial information during the application phase.*

title: Oracle EBS Financials Audit Specialist
description:

**Baer is looking for Oracle EBS Financials Audit Specialist for a 9+ month Federal remote project.**
