title: Risk Analyst
description:
Introduction  

A career in IBM Consulting is rooted by long-term relationships and close collaboration with clients across the globe. With deep expertise in many industries, we offer strategy, experience, technology, and operations services to many of the most innovative and valuable companies in the world. Our people are focused on accelerating our clients’ businesses through the power of collaboration. We believe in the power of technology responsibly used to help people, partners, and the planet. Curiosity and a constant quest for knowledge serve as the foundation to success in IBM Consulting. In your role, you’ll be encouraged to challenge the norm, investigate ideas outside of your role, and come up with creative solutions resulting in ground breaking impact for a wide network of clients. Our culture of evolution and empathy centres on long-term career growth and development opportunities in an environment that embraces your unique skills and experience.  

  

Your Role and Responsibilities  

As a Transaction Monitoring Analyst-Risk & Compliance at Business Process Operations you'll be part of a global team of financial crime specialists working on Transaction Monitoring and Case Investigation process providing services to global banks.  

Responsibilities* You will be responsible for complying with the Bank Secrecy Act(BSA) requirements to prevent, detect, and deter money laundering and terrorist financing through the review of cases escalated by the Alerts team
* The responsibilities include KYC Review, expanded Transaction Review, Due Diligence Research, Prior SAR/CTR filing review, and a decision to close with no risk or recommend the filing of a Suspicious Activity Reporting accompanied by a thorough analysis narrative.
* Identify comprehensive target set of compliance data for users across teams
* Monitor and evaluate compliance data and information collected in support of activities and initiatives

  

Required Technical and Professional Expertise  

* Graduate with 1-3 years of experience in Anti Money Laundering, Enhanced due diligence, Customer identification program and Transaction Monitoring
* Working knowledge in US regulatory policies – Patriot Act, FATF etc
* Experience handling AML Investigation/ Case Investigation
* Ability to provide Recommendations for SAR and CTR Review

  

Preferred Technical and Professional Expertise  

* Ambitious individual who can work under their own direction towards agreed targets/goals
* Proven analytical skills required to organize and analyse multiple, complex data sets as well as strong interpersonal and organizational skills
* Experience in financial services transaction data analysis, risk rating and Name Screening.
* Expertise into criminal investigation, CDD, Legal document review and P&L review

  

About Business UnitIBM Consulting is IBM’s consulting and global professional services business, with market leading capabilities in business and technology transformation. With deep expertise in many industries, we offer strategy, experience, technology, and operations services to many of the most innovative and valuable companies in the world. Our people are focused on accelerating our clients’ businesses through the power of collaboration. We believe in the power of technology responsibly used to help people, partners and the planet.  

This job requires you to be fully COVID-19 vaccinated prior to your start date and proof of vaccination status will be required before your start date. During the Onboarding process you will be asked to confirm your vaccination status, in case you are unable to get vaccinated for any reason, you can let us know at that stage. Please let us know if you are unable to be vaccinated due to medical or religious reasons. IBM will consider such requests on a case by case basis subject to submission of required proof by the candidate before a stipulated date.  

Your Life @ IBMIn a world where technology never stands still, we understand that, dedication to our clients success, innovation that matters, and trust and personal responsibility in all our relationships, lives in what we do as IBMers as we strive to be the catalyst that makes the world work better.
Being an IBMer means you’ll be able to learn and develop yourself and your career, you’ll be encouraged to be courageous and experiment everyday, all whilst having continuous trust and support in an environment where everyone can thrive whatever their personal or professional background.


Our IBMers are growth minded, always staying curious, open to feedback and learning new information and skills to constantly transform themselves and our company. They are trusted to provide on-going feedback to help other IBMers grow, as well as collaborate with colleagues keeping in mind a team focused approach to include different perspectives to drive exceptional outcomes for our customers. The courage our IBMers have to make critical decisions everyday is essential to IBM becoming the catalyst for progress, always embracing challenges with resources they have to hand, a can-do attitude and always striving for an outcome focused approach within everything that they do.


Are you ready to be an IBMer?

  

About IBMIBM’s greatest invention is the IBMer. We believe that through the application of intelligence, reason and science, we can improve business, society and the human condition, bringing the power of an open hybrid cloud and AI strategy to life for our clients and partners around the world.Restlessly reinventing since 1911, we are not only one of the largest corporate organizations in the world, we’re also one of the biggest technology and consulting employers, with many of the Fortune 50 companies relying on the IBM Cloud to run their business. At IBM, we pride ourselves on being an early adopter of artificial intelligence, quantum computing and blockchain. Now it’s time for you to join us on our journey to being a responsible technology innovator and a force for good in the world.

title: Campaign Specialist-sfmc
description:
Introduction  

At IBM, work is more than a job - it's a calling: To build. To design. To code. To consult. To think along with clients and sell. To make markets. To invent. To collaborate. Not just to do something better, but to attempt things you've never thought possible. To lead in this new era of technology and solve some of the world's most challenging problems.  

  

Your Role and Responsibilities  

As Professionals – you are responsible for handling clients across industries within the quality space. You will be responsible to manage complete investigation process related to quality and compliance controls.  

If you thrive in a dynamic, collaborative workplace, IBM provides an environment where you will be challenged and inspired every single day. And if you relish the freedom to bring creative, thoughtful solutions to the table, there's no limit to what you can accomplish here.
  

Responsibilities:-  

Build campaign journeys, filter entry audience
* Build emails using content builder in SFMC
* Creation email communication by drag and drop
* Communicate with market point of contacts
* Investigate journey bugs
* Create and update data extensions for send and personalization requests
* Attach creatives to a journey for final deployment
* Build cloud pages whenever required to connect the email using CTAs
* Creation of user input form pages
* Ability to write to Data Extensions
* Build required automation in Automation Studio whenever required
* Build error and exception handlers to prevent unhandled risk

* Basic HTML knowledge

* Basic HTML knowledge
* Understand campaign brief and campaign flow

title: Configuration Engineer
description:
**WHAT YOU'LL DO**
------------------

  

BCG’s E-mail and Team productivity squad is seeking a knowledgeable and talented engineer to provide technical experience and support on email and team productivity squad tools.
  

  

The sustaining engineering chapter is tasked with serving as a critical bridge between our service and support organization, and our SaaS engineering team. This role is in the unique position of being able to impact support and operations processes, upgrades and maintenance, and automation activities within the Digital Collaboration Tribe.
  

  

In partnership with your team members, your duties will include:
* Assisting with the design and improvement of technical solutions for several defined (and potentially undefined) use cases.
* Provide support to Superhuman tool integrated with outlook and actively involve in adoption of same.
* Spearheading maintenance and upgrade activities on existing BCG solutions, identifying opportunities to automate and streamline them along the way.
* Partnering with our QA team for robust test planning and automation, as well as our Change Management team to ensure operational excellence procedures are consistently followed to reduce the risk of human error and downtime.
* Work closely with the Email and team productivity squad’s SaaS engineering team to support major initiatives, and to ensure solutions are supportable and complement existing services within the business
* Identify and execute on opportunities for automation to reduce the risk of manual support and administrative activities. This will require the use of scripting languages like PowerShell, at times.
* Design and execute the testing of upgrades and support the creation of end user and IT-facing documentation.
* Serve as an escalation point for issues that are high visibility and criticality.
Support other areas of BCG Digital Collaboration team as needed.  
* 

  

**YOU'RE GOOD AT**
------------------

  

* Entrepreneurial and creative thinking to develop concepts and solutions to resolve the firm’s most challenging collaboration needs.
* Strong comprehensive problem-solving skills to identify and resolve issues quickly.
* Working independently as well as part of a virtual, geographically dispersed team, bringing a sense of urgency to the tasks at hand.
* Effectively handling difficult and stressful situations with poise, tact, and patience, while demonstrating a sense of urgency and empathy.
* Strong analytical skills, detail-oriented, and quality-minded.
* Working in an agile environment and using Jira to create, manage, and track stories.
Exceptional verbal and written communication and presentation skills.  
* 

  

**YOU BRING (EXPERIENCE & QUALIFICATIONS)**
-------------------------------------------

  

* Deep understanding of Change Management and Operational Excellence procedures and protocols.
* Strong knowledge of email gateway, message flow, deliver routing, monitoring and reporting.
* Working knowledge of scripting tools like PowerShell and knowledge of Power Automate a significant plus.
* Experience managing elements of the Microsoft 365 portal.
* Familiarity with AI and machine learning concepts is highly desirable.
* Prior experience supporting outlook, Exchange and integrated apps in an enterprise environment is a significant plus.
Experience within complex enterprise organizations with a multi-vendor ecosystem, showing the ability to make these disparate offerings co-exist, and being able to identify and solution for pain points and gaps.  
* 

  

**YOU'LL WORK WITH**
--------------------

  

BCG’s information technology group collaboratively delivers the latest digital technologies that enable our consultants to lead and our business to grow. For our IT jobs, we seek individuals with expertise in the areas of IT infrastructure, application development, business systems, collaborative and social technologies, information security, and project leadership.

title: Security Specialist
description:
**About The Role**
------------------


Our consultants work on everything from client projects to development work and training, dealing with large corporate penetration tests to gaining credit for published advisories. Technical excellence and customer service are key to our work, you will be passionate about finding vulnerabilities while being happy liaising with customers.


Our team is growing, and we need inspiring people to join us and help us to continue to build a world leading cyber security operation whilst benefiting from the opportunity to fulfil their potential.



Based in INDIA, this work will lead on penetration testing, SDLC projects including on-site work, but will have the opportunity to work on projects with worldwide clients and will form part of our global team of penetration testers who share research, tooling, experience and collaborate freely on projects.


As a respected training provider and the leading provider of training at Black Hat conferences, our penetration testers also have the option of developing training skills and delivering security training, to both private customers, at our own events, and at leading international conferences.


**Essential roles & responsibilities**


* Work within a dedicated security engineering function that accelerates and delivers creative and secure capabilities to unlock the value of Gen AI
* Build security control framework and generic reference architectures for GenAI applications.
* Assist with identifying security requirements to be followed by LoB/Dev teams when building GenAI applications.
* Perform security assessments including threat modelling and security integration of Gen AI platforms and business solutions. Ensure that security design and controls are consistent with organisation's security architecture principals.
* Provide thought leadership and creativity to mature Gen AI security governance embedding into our existing cyber security risk appetite framework.
* Ideate and leverage Gen AI to solve cybersecurity problems at scale.
* Develop configuration hardening guidelines for Cloud Services including native Generative AL/ML services such as AWS SageMaker, SageMaker Notebooks, Bedrock, Kendra, OpenSearch, Lambda, Azure Cognitive Services, Open AI, GCP Vertex AI etc.
**About You**
-------------


**Position Specifications**
* 4+ years of Information Security experience in areas of Information/Cloud Security
* Certification in any of the AI/ML cloud services
* Good understanding of application and data security, AI/Gen AI, Machine Learning, or data science.
* Demonstrated knowledge of software development processes (SLDC/Agile/Iterative/DevOps)
* Experience of delivering security solution architecture from end-to-end.
* Threat modelling using industry standard methodologies (e.g. STRIDE/DREAD)
* Security architecture assessments for one or more IT systems such as Web, Mobile, APIs/Microservices, Cloud (AWS/GCP/Azure/Oracle)
* Experience developing Reference Security Architecture and Design Patterns to support proactive and automated controls.
* A demonstrated knowledge of information security standards, rules and regulations related to information security and data confidentiality and other various security standards and policies.
* Ability to keep up to date with technology and security. Make informed decision and appropriate adjustments .
* Good interpersonal and communication skills with the ability to influence at all levels of the organisation, while being able to simplify complex topics.
* Ability to organise, prioritise, and lead multiple deliverables simultaneously across a large, global corporate environment.
**About Us**
------------


**About Claranet**



Founded at the beginning of the dot.com bubble in 1996, our CEO Charles Nasser had a light bulb moment to develop a truly customer-focused IT business. Since then, Claranet has grown from an Internet Service Provider (ISP) in the UK to being one of the leading business modernisation experts, who deliver solutions across 11+ countries.



At Claranet, we’re experienced in implementing progressive technology solutions which help our customers solve their epic business challenges. We’re committed to understanding their problems, delivering answers quickly, and making a lasting impact to their business.



We are agile, focused and experienced in business modernisation. Our approach helps customers make genuine, significant shifts in their business strategy, to deliver financial savings, boost innovation, and create a resilient business. We continually invest in our people and the latest technologies, so our customers get peace of mind knowing that they have access to the best talent and services.



In the UK we have over 500 staff working in London, Gloucester, Warrington, Bristol, and Leeds, or as homeworkers.


**Working for Claranet**



Here at Claranet we pride ourselves on going the extra mile for and with our employees (yes, we really mean with). We offer an extensive benefits package that you can tailor to your needs, inclusive of a matching contribution pension scheme, healthcare, insurance, dental, discounted gyms and app supported benefit access.



But what we think makes us different is ‘Team Claranet,’ our dedicated internal part of the business that supports you with matters close to your heart. We proudly support local charities in each of our office locations, support employees with paid charity leave, organise key charity fundraising event per year and have a dedicated committee responsible for supporting employee’s fundraising efforts.



Claranet are one of the 10 founding members of TC4RE (Technology Community for Racial Equality.) Being a part of a group of leading UK technology organisations, we are dedicated to building a more diverse and inclusive workforce. We are also very proud members of Tech Talent Charter, a government supported, industry-led membership group created to address the UK’s tech talent shortage and diversity gap through collective action.


**Our Vision**



Our vision is to become the most trusted technology solutions partner; renowned for being the best and brightest, having lasting impact with our customers and delivering exceptional returns to our stakeholders.


**Role Mission**

Claranet Cyber Security is a world class business unit within Claranet, giving customers access to market-leading information security services spanning, training, consulting, and managed security services. Formed through the combined forces of NotSoSecure (based in US, UK and India), the UK Security Business Unit (previously known as Sec-1), and units in Brazil, France and Portugal.



Our work takes us around the world where we speak and provided Hacking Training at top security events such as BlackHat, AppSec, OWASP, Ruxcon Breakpoint, Defcon, HITB, and BruCON. Our Penetration Testing work feeds into this; we apply our research and share our knowledge through our Hacking Training, white papers and tools. Check out our blog posts on the NotSoSecure website.



The team has a strong heritage of penetration testing, consultancy and security training for leading worldwide brands, built on the quality of its technical team and excellent customer service. In recent years the teams have also created a number of new managed security services and has aspirations to grow significantly over a number of markets, including US, Brazil, France and Germany, through sales to existing and new medium and larger enterprise organisations.

title: Campaign Specialist-sfmc
description:
Introduction  

At IBM, work is more than a job - it's a calling: To build. To design. To code. To consult. To think along with clients and sell. To make markets. To invent. To collaborate. Not just to do something better, but to attempt things you've never thought possible. Are you ready to lead in this new era of technology and solve some of the world's most challenging problems? If so, lets talk.  

  

Your Role and Responsibilities  

As SFMC Consultant, you are responsible to facilitate tactic development through Production Partners and Marketing Managers, and ensuring timelines are met. You will perform art and copy proofing, link validation, and facilitates creative approval process from legal.  

  

**Responsibilities:*** Manage day-to-day operation of email marketing and automation programs, specifically Salesforce marketing cloud, to optimize programs and initiatives
* Create and maintain marketing automations, end to end Customer Journeys and Campaign Building using Automation Builder/Journey Builder
* Facilitate list critical issue with Research and Analytics (R&A), Originator, Marketing Manager and Campaign Analyst to secure resolution and approval
* Review and validate campaign workflow/process flow for given campaign
* Validate Audience sheet for the respective tactic/channel/campaign
* Coordinate with stakeholders and ensure timely launch of the campaignBuild complex campaign journeys, filter entry audience.
* Build SQL scripts to extract data and use it as an entry audience
* Creation of base templates and content blocks with personalization
* Communication with market point of contacts, solution assessment and effort estimation, support internal team
* Communicate with IBM colleagues and provide support for junior team members
* Analyse the campaign requirements and suggest the type of DE and logic that needs to be used
* Understand the database structure to come up with exception handling while amp scripting
* Develop AMP Scripting for dynamic builds, hide/show blocks
* Creation of user input form pages
* Build required automation in Automation Studio whenever required
Build error and exception handlers to prevent unhandled risks  
* 

  

  

Required Technical and Professional Expertise  

* Bachelor’s degree with 8+ year of experience in Marketing Automation
* Minimum 3+ years of experience using AMP scripting
* Minimum 3+ years of responsive HTML, CSS & JavaScript coding experience
* Certified Salesforce Marketing Cloud Professional
* Understand campaign brief and campaign flow - basic and complex campaigns
* Able to communicate with client representatives to clarify campaign requirements
* Good Written and Verbal Communication
* Understand data model and how database works (primary + foreign key, relations)
* Knowledge of HTML/CSS code, write and adjusting the code and custom coding
* Exposure of creating solutions based on campaign requirements
* At least basics of programming (e.g., cycles, variables, functions)
* Knowledge of SQL is must
* Knowledge of JavaScript is plus, preferred AMP Script, Server-Side JavaScript
* Marketing Cloud knowledge must
* IT overview - how systems are linked, how data flows, web technologies
* API and Postman knowledge nice to have
* Should know building multi-channel journeys
* Should be well versed in creating and updating data extensions
* Should be well versed in building cloud pages and microsites
* Working knowledge of Automation Studio
* In-depth knowledge of relevant integrations and automations for complex build.
* Proven experience in writing SQL queries.
* Good understanding of journey builder in SFMC and creation of relevant performance dashboards

  

Preferred Technical and Professional Expertise  

* Ambitious individual who can work under their own direction towards agreed targets/goals.
* Ability to handle change and be open to it good time management and an ability to work under stress
* Proven interpersonal skills while contributing to team effort by accomplishing related results as needed
* Maintain technical knowledge by attending educational workshops, reviewing publications.
* Experience to document campaign close-out

Our people are focused on accelerating our clients’ businesses through the power of collaboration. We believe in the power of technology responsibly used to help people, partners and the planet.  

This job requires you to be fully COVID-19 vaccinated prior to your start date and proof of vaccination status will be required before your start date. During the Onboarding process you will be asked to confirm your vaccination status, in case you are unable to get vaccinated for any reason, you can let us know at that stage. Please let us know if you are unable to be vaccinated due to medical or religious reasons. IBM will consider such requests on a case by case basis subject to submission of required proof by the candidate before a stipulated date.  

Your Life @ IBMIn a world where technology never stands still, we understand that, dedication to our clients success, innovation that matters, and trust and personal responsibility in all our relationships, lives in what we do as IBMers as we strive to be the catalyst that makes the world work better.
Being an IBMer means you’ll be able to learn and develop yourself and your career, you’ll be encouraged to be courageous and experiment everyday, all whilst having continuous trust and support in an environment where everyone can thrive whatever their personal or professional background.


Our IBMers are growth minded, always staying curious, open to feedback and learning new information and skills to constantly transform themselves and our company. They are trusted to provide on-going feedback to help other IBMers grow, as well as collaborate with colleagues keeping in mind a team focused approach to include different perspectives to drive exceptional outcomes for our customers. The courage our IBMers have to make critical decisions everyday is essential to IBM becoming the catalyst for progress, always embracing challenges with resources they have to hand, a can-do attitude and always striving for an outcome focused approach within everything that they do.

We believe that through the application of intelligence, reason and science, we can improve business, society and the human condition, bringing the power of an open hybrid cloud and AI strategy to life for our clients and partners around the world.Restlessly reinventing since 1911, we are not only one of the largest corporate organizations in the world, we’re also one of the biggest technology and consulting employers, with many of the Fortune 50 companies relying on the IBM Cloud to run their business. At IBM, we pride ourselves on being an early adopter of artificial intelligence, quantum computing and blockchain. Now it’s time for you to join us on our journey to being a responsible technology innovator and a force for good in the world.

title: Campaign Specialist-sfmc
description:
Introduction  

At IBM, work is more than a job - it's a calling: To build. To design. To code. To consult. To think along with clients and sell. To make markets. To invent. To collaborate. Not just to do something better, but to attempt things you've never thought possible. Are you ready to lead in this new era of technology and solve some of the world's most challenging problems? If so, lets talk.  

  

Your Role and Responsibilities  

As SFMC Consultant, you are responsible to facilitate tactic development through Production Partners and Marketing Managers, and ensuring timelines are met. You will perform art and copy proofing, link validation, and facilitates creative approval process from legal.  

  

**Responsibilities:*** Manage day-to-day operation of email marketing and automation programs, specifically Salesforce marketing cloud, to optimize programs and initiatives
* Create and maintain marketing automations, end to end Customer Journeys and Campaign Building using Automation Builder/Journey Builder
* Facilitate list critical issue with Research and Analytics (R&A), Originator, Marketing Manager and Campaign Analyst to secure resolution and approval
* Review and validate campaign workflow/process flow for given campaign
* Validate Audience sheet for the respective tactic/channel/campaign
* Coordinate with stakeholders and ensure timely launch of the campaignBuild complex campaign journeys, filter entry audience.
* Build SQL scripts to extract data and use it as an entry audience
* Creation of base templates and content blocks with personalization
* Communication with market point of contacts, solution assessment and effort estimation, support internal team
* Communicate with IBM colleagues and provide support for junior team members
* Analyse the campaign requirements and suggest the type of DE and logic that needs to be used
* Understand the database structure to come up with exception handling while amp scripting
* Develop AMP Scripting for dynamic builds, hide/show blocks
* Creation of user input form pages
* Build required automation in Automation Studio whenever required
Build error and exception handlers to prevent unhandled risks  
* 

  

  

Required Technical and Professional Expertise  

* Bachelor’s degree with 8+ year of experience in Marketing Automation
* Minimum 3+ years of experience using AMP scripting
* Minimum 3+ years of responsive HTML, CSS & JavaScript coding experience
* Certified Salesforce Marketing Cloud Professional
* Understand campaign brief and campaign flow - basic and complex campaigns
* Able to communicate with client representatives to clarify campaign requirements
* Good Written and Verbal Communication
* Understand data model and how database works (primary + foreign key, relations)
* Knowledge of HTML/CSS code, write and adjusting the code and custom coding
* Exposure of creating solutions based on campaign requirements
* At least basics of programming (e.g., cycles, variables, functions)
* Knowledge of SQL is must
* Knowledge of JavaScript is plus, preferred AMP Script, Server-Side JavaScript
* Marketing Cloud knowledge must
* IT overview - how systems are linked, how data flows, web technologies
* API and Postman knowledge nice to have
* Should know building multi-channel journeys
* Should be well versed in creating and updating data extensions
* Should be well versed in building cloud pages and microsites
* Working knowledge of Automation Studio
* In-depth knowledge of relevant integrations and automations for complex build.
* Proven experience in writing SQL queries.
* Good understanding of journey builder in SFMC and creation of relevant performance dashboards

  

Preferred Technical and Professional Expertise  

* Ambitious individual who can work under their own direction towards agreed targets/goals.
* Ability to handle change and be open to it good time management and an ability to work under stress
* Proven interpersonal skills while contributing to team effort by accomplishing related results as needed
* Maintain technical knowledge by attending educational workshops, reviewing publications.
* Experience to document campaign close-out

  

About Business UnitIBM Consulting is IBM’s consulting and global professional services business, with market leading capabilities in business and technology transformation. With deep expertise in many industries, we offer strategy, experience, technology, and operations services to many of the most innovative and valuable companies in the world. * Build required automation in Automation Studio whenever required
Build error and exception handlers to prevent unhandled risks  
* 

  

  

Required Technical and Professional Expertise  

* Bachelor’s degree with 8+ year of experience in Marketing Automation
* Minimum 3+ years of experience using AMP scripting
* Minimum 3+ years of responsive HTML, CSS & JavaScript coding experience
* Certified Salesforce Marketing Cloud Professional
* Understand campaign brief and campaign flow - basic and complex campaigns
* Able to communicate with client representatives to clarify campaign requirements
* Good Written and Verbal Communication
* Understand data model and how database works (primary + foreign key, relations)
* Knowledge of HTML/CSS code, write and adjusting the code and custom coding
* Exposure of creating solutions based on campaign requirements
* At least basics of programming (e.g., cycles, variables, functions)
* Knowledge of SQL is must
* Knowledge of JavaScript is plus, preferred AMP Script, Server-Side JavaScript
* Marketing Cloud knowledge must
* IT overview - how systems are linked, how data flows, web technologies
* API and Postman knowledge nice to have
* Should know building multi-channel journeys
* Should be well versed in creating and updating data extensions
* Should be well versed in building cloud pages and microsites
* Working knowledge of Automation Studio
* In-depth knowledge of relevant integrations and automations for complex build.
* Proven experience in writing SQL queries.
* Good understanding of journey builder in SFMC and creation of relevant performance dashboards

  

Preferred Technical and Professional Expertise  

* Ambitious individual who can work under their own direction towards agreed targets/goals.
* Ability to handle change and be open to it good time management and an ability to work under stress
* Proven interpersonal skills while contributing to team effort by accomplishing related results as needed
* Maintain technical knowledge by attending educational workshops, reviewing publications.
* Experience to document campaign close-out

title: Campaign Specialist-sfmc
description:
Introduction  

At IBM, work is more than a job - it's a calling: To build. To design. To code. To consult. To think along with clients and sell. To make markets. To invent. To collaborate. Not just to do something better, but to attempt things you've never thought possible. Are you ready to lead in this new era of technology and solve some of the world's most challenging problems? If so, lets talk.  

  

Your Role and Responsibilities  

As SFMC Consultant, you are responsible to facilitate tactic development through Production Partners and Marketing Managers, and ensuring timelines are met. You will perform art and copy proofing, link validation, and facilitates creative approval process from legal.  

  

**Responsibilities:*** Manage day-to-day operation of email marketing and automation programs, specifically Salesforce marketing cloud, to optimize programs and initiatives
* Create and maintain marketing automations, end to end Customer Journeys and Campaign Building using Automation Builder/Journey Builder
* Facilitate list critical issue with Research and Analytics (R&A), Originator, Marketing Manager and Campaign Analyst to secure resolution and approval

* Understand the database structure to come up with exception handling while amp scripting

Build error and exception handlers to prevent unhandled risks  
*

title: Infrastructure Specialist
description:
Introduction  

At IBM, work is more than a job - it's a calling: To build. To design. To code. To consult. To think along with clients and sell. To make markets. To invent. To collaborate. Not just to do something better, but to attempt things you've never thought possible. Are you ready to lead in this new era of technology and solve some of the world's most challenging problems? If so, lets talk.  

  

Your Role and Responsibilities  

As zPDT system administrator you will provide an efficient, productive and secure development, test and simulation environment for the IBM zSystems firmware development teams. Besides system management you will also be responsible for the tools and scripts that are required to run and setup the systems.  

  

Responsibilities:
  

As System Owner of the zPDT hosts you will* Install and maintain different flavours of Linux, sepcifically RHEL Ubuntu, SLES on x86 and other platforms.
* Install security fixes and regular OS patch updates
* Configure shared file systems like NFS, GSA server and clients
* Configure filesystems and volume groups
* Install and configure the project-specific applications
* Install and configure tools for zPDT development
* Configure access and user management
* Configure network connections
* Maintain a secure configuration
* Work with the hardware administrators to reconfigure existing hosts and install new servers be responsible for the availability and normal responsiveness of the system as their administrator
* Building the tools, scripts, and operating procedures for continuous improvement

  

Required Technical and Professional Expertise  

* 6+ years of Industry experience.
* 3+ years Linux administration skills preferably on RHEL, Ubuntu or SLES
* Extensive knowledge of Shell, Perl, and/or Python scripting
* Experienced in installing and configuring open-source tools
* Good knowledge in Ansible Playbooks and other automation skills
* Ability to debug network or load performance issues
* Excellent problem-solving and communication abilities

  

Preferred Technical and Professional Expertise  

Optional skills:* Network configuration: VX-LAN
* Knowledge in CI/CD and pipeline automation tools
* knowledge about Directory-Services (mostly LDAP)
* PAM and NSS
* Shared Filesystems: GSA, NFS

title: Industrial Consultant
description:
Introduction  

Are you looking for a career that will allow you to use your unique blend of business acumen and tech savvy? Business Analysts at IBM are subject matter experts that build the bridge between our business and our clients, immersing themselves into the market to understand problems and find innovative solutions. Be ready to navigate the complex relationships that make the business world run and find the actionable insights that result in great business decisions.  

  

Your Role and Responsibilities  

As a Payments and Cards Industry Banking Consultant with expertise in Indian Banking and a deep understanding of core banking, payments, and cards modules, your role is pivotal in providing strategic guidance, advisory services to our banking clients and responsible for application support and leading the payments and cards tower with technical expertise. You will collaborate with financial institutions to optimize their payment and cards solutions, ensuring compliance, efficiency, and customer satisfaction.* Manage the Payments and Cards Banking Tower for Application Support Services for an Indian Bank.
* Handle all Client communication and Escalations for this tower.
* Problem analysis and validation of classification.
* Work effectively with your team to troubleshoot and restore applications that are in the payments and cards module.
* Set up Support services and ensure SLAs and KPIs are met.
* Collaborate to resolve issues across client Application / Infra etc. Team, IBM Team and 3rd Party.
* Effective handling of Critical Situation in relation to Sev 1/ Severity 2 and Critical Severity 3 issues.
* Work towards making the applications more efficient by implementing right monitoring services, automation and items of next gen AMS and build further business and ensure account profitability.
* Advises clients regarding products and solutions for solving problems in the Banking Industry for payments and Cards. Specialist is knowledgeable in the trends and directions of the industry, the marketplace, and the players. Specialized in broad knowledge of the banking industry and deep knowledge of clients' businesses and how it relates to specific banking segments.
* Collaborate with senior management to define the strategic direction for the payments and cards tower, aligning it with the overall business goals of the bank.
* Identify opportunities for innovation and growth within the payments and cards domain.
* Provide technical leadership and expertise in payments and cards solutions, including understanding the intricacies of payment processing, card issuance, and digital payment technologies.
* Guide the development and implementation of payment and card-related IT solutions, ensuring they meet industry standards and regulatory requirements.
* Lead technical teams, offering guidance and mentorship to ensure the successful execution of incident fix.
* Oversee the application support function within the payments and cards tower, ensuring that applications are maintained, updated, and operating smoothly.
* Develop and implement robust incident management processes for timely issue resolution.
* Monitor system performance, troubleshoot technical issues, and coordinate with IT teams to implement fixes and enhancements.
* Conduct root cause analysis for recurring issues and implement preventive measures.
* Ensure that the bank's payment and card systems adhere to all relevant regulations, including data security and fraud prevention standards.
* Promote knowledge sharing and transfer of technical expertise within the payments and cards tower and across relevant departments.
* Provide training and guidance to team members on payment and card technologies and best practices.
* Develop and maintain reporting mechanisms to track key performance indicators (KPIs) related to payment and card systems' performance, incident resolution, and compliance.

  

**Who you are:**  

Payments and Cards Expert and Tower Lead – Indian Banking environment.  

You are a seasoned professional with a strong background in the Indian banking industry, particularly in Payments and Cards. Your in-depth knowledge of industry regulations, emerging trends, and customer expectations sets you apart. You possess exceptional analytical, problem-solving, and communication skills. You thrive in a client-facing role, building strong relationships with banking clients. You have a proven track record of successfully implementing payment and cards solutions and provide support services for payments and cards applications.  

  

**What you’ll do:*** Collaborate with clients to assess their payment and cards needs, objectives, and challenges.
* Provide expert advice and recommendations on optimizing payments, and cards modules to enhance operational efficiency and customer experience.
* Develop and implement strategies for card product development, payment processing, and digital banking solutions.
* Analyze market trends, competition, and regulatory changes to help clients stay competitive and compliant.
* Conduct workshops, training sessions, and knowledge transfer activities for banking teams to enhance their expertise in payment and cards solutions.
* Lead and support the application support team under payments and cards module to fix the incidents and ensuring successful delivery and client satisfaction.
* Provide guidance on risk management, fraud prevention, and security measures within the payments and cards domain.
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including IT, compliance, and legal, to ensure alignment with industry standards and regulatory requirements.
* Manage the Payments and Cards Tower and ensure effective communication with the client
* Manage all L1/L2/L3 team members under you.
* Manage Critical Situations Effectively.
* Manage Service Levels Effectively.
* Ensure Productivity in your Tower through Automation and Next Gen AMS techniques.
* Generate Further Business through CRs.
* Provide L1/L2/L3 support for payment applications- (UPI) – EPH + MGS switch, AePS – EPH switch, SFMS platform – RTGS + NEFT, RTGS + NEFT - EPH platform, IMPS - EPH platform, (NACH)- EPH platform, CBDC, etc.
* Effective handling of Critical Situation in relation to Sev 1/ Severity 2 and Critical Severity 3 issues. Resolve Sev 1/ Severity 2 and Critical Severity 3 issues within SLAs.
* Change the application code to fix issues permanently.
* Maintain Known error Database (KEDB) for future reference.
* Automate processes to increase productivity.
* Stabilize the application by providing permanent fixes and foresee defects to avoid tickets.
* Lead a team of 20(more than 20).
* Interaction and managing client in critical situations.

**How we’ll help you grow:*** Access to cutting-edge resources and training programs to enhance your expertise.
* Opportunity to work with a dynamic team of banking professionals and gain exposure to diverse banking technologies.
* Participation in industry-specific conferences and seminars to expand your knowledge and network.
* Career advancement opportunities within our organization as you demonstrate your expertise and leadership in management for banking applications.
* Access to all the technical and management training courses you need to become the expert you want to be.
* Learn directly from expert developers in the field; our team leads love to mentor.
* Opportunity to work in many different areas to figure out what really excites you.

  

Required Technical and Professional Expertise  

* Strong skills in Core Java, J2EE, Spring, Web technologies ( HTML, CSS, React, JavaScript, REST JSON etc).
* Understanding of web technology stack JSF, jQuery, JavaScript, HTML5/CSS3.
* Experience working with databases MYSQL and Oracle.
* Familiar on using Code Coverage and Static analysis tools.
* Understanding of security protocols, encryption/decryption technologies, HSM, certificates.
* Understanding of Docker, Kubernetes.
* Proficiency in business modelling and business requirements definition disciplines through object-oriented architecture, Unified Modelling Language (UML), use cases, user stories, etc.
* Payment domain expert with excellent knowledge of Payment Transactions, Authorization, Acquiring process.
* Excellent knowledge global payment types and settlement systems such as ACH, Target 2, SEPA, SWIFT, RTGS, etc.
* Payment features, Payment Gateway, Tokenization and other payment channels & Financial Transactions.
* Exposure around switching products like ACI Base24 Postilion.
* Strong knowledge of Experience in Merchant Management System, Backoffice and Authorization, clearing settlement.
* Exposure on Instant payments, ISO20022 and PSD2 would be an added advantage.
* Strong knowledge of banking regulations, compliance requirements, and industry standards.
* Ability to analyze vendor performance data and make data-driven decisions.
* Should have handled a team 20(more than 20) in the Banking Industry
* Ability to work collaboratively with cross-functional teams and manage stakeholders effectively.
* Analytical mindset and problem-solving abilities.

  

Preferred Technical and Professional Expertise  

* Knowledge and Experience in Monitoring Tools like Dynatrace
* Experience in implementing Niche state of Art solutions in Banking.
* Familiarity with industry-specific security standards and regulations in the Indian banking sector.

title: Identity Manager
description:
Introduction  

As an IBM Cloud Architect in the Technology Expert Labs team you will provide architectural advice and solution strategies in the use of IBM Cloud to address our clients’ strategic business and technical goals. You will primarily collaborate with our clients to lead and develop the target to-be solution architecture that uses IBM Cloud. These projects may include multiple phases from inception, discovery, design, planning, implementation, workload migration, and hand over of the solution to the designated "day 2" operations team. You will provide solution architecture and technical leadership throughout these phases. Solutions are documented as architectures and can include systems, applications, processes and service components all hosted in IBM Cloud and integrated with client on premise systems in accordance with their hybrid cloud journey.  

  

Your Role and Responsibilities  

IBM Technology Expert Labs Security (IBM Security Professional Services) is looking for Consultant with deep Identity and Access Management expertise with proven record in Security domain and experience with IBM Security Verify products. The candidate will have the ultimate responsibility of delivering the design, deployment, configuration, tuning and knowledge transfer of IBM Security Verify products (ISVA, ISVG, ISAM,ISIM) for Expert Labs customers. This is a customer facing role.  

  

This is an opportunity to work with the delivery of professional services for world leading security platform of IBM Security Verify. Be part of a dynamic team delivering professional services to IBM customers. Great opportunity for growth and constantly interesting sets of challenges to solve. IBM Technology Expert Labs Security team thrives on working in dynamic customer facing environments, each offering compelling challenges and exciting opportunities to make a difference.  

  

The consultant will be expected to lead all phases of IBM Security Verify design, consultancy and implementation engagements.* Scoping, Planning, Design and Implementation of IBM Identity and Access Management and Governance solutions
* Managing delivery of services as per scope specified in Statement of Work
* Provide deep technical expertise to ensure IBM Identity and Access Management solutions are deployed and operating to deliver the technical and business results required by the customer
* To act as a trusted client advisor to customers
* Integrating solution with applications

**Security Practice and Delivery:*** Participate in client meetings to gather and validate market requirements
* Lead clients in requirements gathering, system definition and documentation.
* Participate in project delivery to varying degrees depending on project complexity and geography needs
* Establish demonstrated client relationships in key accounts to help progress the IBM Security portfolio


Individual must have a strong interest and expertise in Security in general with preference for Identity and Access Management. A qualified individual would be familiar with industry blogs, key publications in the field of security and would have full awareness of any recent significant security events.  

  

Required Technical and Professional Expertise  

* At Least 10 years of experience is required on IBM Identity and Access Management Solutions
* Deep knowledge of IBM Security Verify (ISV) / IBM Security Access Manager (ISAM) / IBM Security Identity Manager (ISIM)
* Installation and Configuration of ISV / ISAM / ISIM and its dependent components/products in on-premises as well as on containerized platforms.
* Advanced skills in configuration, customization, integration, tuning and troubleshooting of IBM Identity and Access Management (IAM) solutions
* Advanced understanding of LDAP Concepts and deep knowledge of IBM Security Directory Server
* Advanced understanding of creating WebSEAL reverse proxy instances, configurations and SSO integrations with different applications.
* Deep understanding of Advanced Access Control and Federation modules of ISVA.
* Advanced understanding of ISVA API
* Advanced understanding of different MFA features of ISVA
* Detailed functional knowledge of Authorization delegation and Federation protocols (SAML, OAuth, FIDO, OpenID-Connect)
* Installation, Configuration and administration of middleware of IBM DB2, IBM WebSphere Application Server
* Container deployment and orchestration
* Deep knowledge of best practices for Identity and Access Management implementation
* Experience in ISV/ISAM/ISIM migration/upgrade scenario
* Understanding of Zero Trust Security
* Knowledge of CIAM implementation using ISV
* Knowledge of extension points of ISAM/ISIM solution
* Advanced experience on IBM Security Directory Integrator
* Custom adapter development for ISIM
* Linux/Unix administration skills
* Experience in Java, Java Script, Python
* Excellent Communication and leadership skills

  

Preferred Technical and Professional Expertise  

* Industry certifications like CISSP, CISM would be added advantage
* Working knowledge of Containers
* Knowledge of virtualization technologies

title: Site Reliability Engineer
description:
Introduction  

As a Site Reliability Engineer for Developer Platform and Programs (DPP), you will join an Agile development team as a DevOps and DevSecOps expert, who provides pipeline and deployment  

automation with a spirit of excellence and the highest quality. You will provide middleware support, tool management, and operating system administration to keep our platforms secure, compliant, and running. You are problem solving, a collaborative, and empathic to developers and your  

teammates.  

  

Who we are...  

The DPP organization provides value through external developer-focused content, IBM watsonx coding competitions, and guided labs that offer hands-on experience with generative AI technologies. You work across a functional team of engineers with expertise in industry-leading interactive web and lab development, SRE, and self-publishing. This work is done within the DPP organization, which includes IBM Developer, Skills Network, and Call for Code.  

  

Your Role and Responsibilities  

In this role, you must have a willingness to learn about new technologies, to be flexible with tasks and deliverables, and to be culturally adaptable as you work with developers across geographies. Success is measured by the reliability & impact that DPP common services have on stakeholders that will leverage these services – IBM organizations hosting coding challenges, content creators who rely on self-publishing, and external developers who leverage advocacy content and events. In addition, your responsibilities include, but are not limited to:* Five years experience in building CI/CD pipelines for large scale SaaS applications using Jenkins, Tekton, or an equivalent platform
* Demonstrate experience with containerization technologies such as Docker or Kubernetes, including use with OpenShift
* Ensure cross-component consistency and functionality.
* Demonstrate good understanding of security on Cloud-based applications
* Have knowledge of configuration management tools, such as Akamai
* Have experience deploying time-sensitive publishing updates.
* Excellent analytical & problem solving skills
* Ensure that components and solutions excel at performance, reliability, and web scalability.
* Participate in planning milestones, managing risks, and resolving issues that affect scope, schedule, and quality.
Coach and collaborate with other development team members.  
* 

  

  

Required Technical and Professional Expertise  

* Advocate for a one-team approach, where SRE is integrated into the fabric of the development team, with a focus on automation, patch management, shared workflows, reduce manual processes, and improved performance.
* Lead the effort to deploy an automation test framework and modernized approach to site observability.
* Experience with web development tools, such React Native, JavaScript or Node.JS.
* Deep experience with modern app development practices, such as containerization and Kubernetes deployments.
* Experience with CI/CD and continuous delivery best practices.
* Experience with security and privacy standards, such as threat management, certificate management, regulatory compliance, and Global Privacy Assessment.
* Provide SRE support for operational services, such as monitoring, serviceability, and license management with 24/7 availability.
* Recommend alternate solutions to accommodate software gaps.
* Share a point of view in planning, design, development, maintenance and ongoing support of new feature requests and requirements.
Ensure that the DPP platform is built to scale, simplified, and streamlined; it must adhere to industry standards, be optimized for stakeholder use cases, and be maintainable and operational with minimum manual intervention.  
* 

  

  

Preferred Technical and Professional Expertise  

* Familiarity with OpenShift deployments
* Familiarity with scripting languages such as Python.
* Broad experience with IBM’s AI portfolio
* Experience working with clients, partners or Independent Software Vendors

title: Delivery Executive
description:
Introduction  

A DPE should have strong technical experience in supporting and delivering Application Support Services in Banking Industry in India . He should have a strong background in supporting Finacle and other applications. He should be aware of incident management process and how AMS services work in banking industry. He should have knowledge of RBI regulations and impact of it in AMS. He should have good knowledge of how and what KPIS are monitored in banking domain in India.  

  

Your Role and Responsibilities  

* Mange all application towers for Application Support Services for an Indian Bank
* Handle all Client communication and Escalations
* Problem analysis and validation of classification.
* Work effectively with your team to troubleshoot and restore applications
* Set up Support services such that SLA are met
* Collaborate to resolve issues across client Application / Infra etc. Team, IBM Team and 3rd Party
* Effective handling of Critical Situation in relation to Sev 1/ Severity 2 and Critical Severity 3 issues
* Work towards making the applications more efficient by implementing right monitoring services, automation and items of next gen AMS
* Build further business and ensure account profitability
* Advises clients regarding products and solutions for solving problems in the Banking Industry for Core Banking. Specialist is knowledgeable in the trends and directions of the industry, the marketplace, and the players. Specialized in broad knowledge of the banking industry and deep knowledge of clients' businesses and how it relates to specific banking segments.


Who you are:* Project Manager across all Towers of Application Support Services


What you’ll do:
* Manage a team of more than 100 for application Support Services
* Manage and Ensure Effective Communication with the client
* Manage all L1/L2/L3 team members under you
* Manage Critical Situations Effectively
* Manage Service Levels Effectively
* Ensure Productivity in your Tower through Automation and Next Gen AMS techniques
* Generate Further Business through CRs

  

Required Technical and Professional Expertise  

* Good Understanding and experience in handling Application Support Services (Primary)
* Good Understanding and experience in handling Infra Services Services
* Experience in working in Core Banking in the Indian Environment
* Should have handled a team 90 in the Banking Industry
* Effective Handling of Critical Situations
* Ability to handle Stress Situations Effectively

  

Preferred Technical and Professional Expertise  

* Knowledge in managing larger Teams in the range of 90 to 100
* Experience in implementing Niche state of Art solutions in Banking / Innovative solutions
* Experience in generating further business in core banking

  

About Business UnitIBM Consulting is IBM’s consulting and global professional services business, with market leading capabilities in business and technology transformation. With deep expertise in many industries, we offer strategy, experience, technology, and operations services to many of the most innovative and valuable companies in the world. Our people are focused on accelerating our clients’ businesses through the power of collaboration. We believe in the power of technology responsibly used to help people, partners and the planet.

title: Identity Manager
description:
Introduction  

As an IBM Cloud Architect in the Technology Expert Labs team you will provide architectural advice and solution strategies in the use of IBM Cloud to address our clients’ strategic business and technical goals. You will primarily collaborate with our clients to lead and develop the target to-be solution architecture that uses IBM Cloud. These projects may include multiple phases from inception, discovery, design, planning, implementation, workload migration, and hand over of the solution to the designated "day 2" operations team. You will provide solution architecture and technical leadership throughout these phases. Solutions are documented as architectures and can include systems, applications, processes and service components all hosted in IBM Cloud and integrated with client on premise systems in accordance with their hybrid cloud journey.  

  

Your Role and Responsibilities  

IBM Technology Expert Labs Security (IBM Security Professional Services) is looking for Consultant with experience on IBM Security Verify products having developer skills. The candidate will have the ultimate responsibility of delivering the Deployment, configuration and custom development on IBM Security Verify products (ISVA, ISVG, ISAM,ISIM) for Expert Labs customers. This is a customer facing role.  

  

This is an opportunity to work with the delivery of professional services for world leading security platform of IBM Security Verify. Be part of a dynamic team delivering professional services to IBM customers. Great opportunity for growth and constantly interesting sets of challenges to solve. IBM Technology Expert Labs Security team thrives on working in dynamic customer facing environments, each offering compelling challenges and exciting opportunities to make a difference.* Scoping, Design, Custom development and Implementation of IBM Identity and Access Management and Governance solutions
* Provide technical expertise to ensure IBM Identity and Access Management solutions are deployed and operating to deliver the technical and business results required by the customer
* To act as a trusted client advisor to customers
* Integrating IBM IAM solution with applications

**Security Practice and Delivery:*** Participate in client meetings to gather and validate market requirements
* Lead clients in requirements gathering, system definition and documentation.
* Participate in project delivery to varying degrees depending on project complexity and geography needs


Individual must have a strong interest and expertise in Security in general with preference for Identity and Access Management. A qualified individual would be familiar with industry blogs, key publications in the field of security and would have full awareness of any recent significant security events.  

  

Required Technical and Professional Expertise  

* At Least 3 years of experience is required on IBM Identity and Access Management Solutions
* Sound Knowledge of IBM Security Verify (ISV) / IBM Security Access Manager (ISAM) / IBM Security Identity Manager (ISIM)
* Installation and Configuration of ISV / ISAM / ISIM and its dependent components/products in on-premises as well as on containerized platforms
* Strong coding experience in Infomap, Java Script (Server-side), Python (Ansible) & Ability to understand and update existing source code.
* Detailed understanding of Container deployment and orchestration.
* Detailed understanding of ISVA API flow and end-to-end request response channel.
* Detailed understanding with DevOps methodologies and container technologies such as OpenShift.
* Detailed understanding of API platforms and exposure to cross platform API interaction code development.
* Strong experience in the overall security of Web Infrastructure and best practices.
* Understanding of ISVA Representational State Transfer (REST) interfaces.
* Understanding of configuration, integration and troubleshooting of IBM Security Verify Access
* Understanding of LDAP Concepts and deep knowledge of IBM Security Directory Server
+ Understanding of creating WebSEAL reverse proxy instances, configurations and SSO integrations with different applications.

* Knowledge of extension points of IBM Access Management solution.
* Installation, Configuration and administration of middleware of IBM DB2, IBM WebSphere Application Server
* Understanding of different MFA features of ISVA
* Functional knowledge of Authorization delegation and Federation protocols (SAML, OAuth, FIDO, OpenID-Connect)
* Exxperience on IBM Security Directory Integrator
* Linux/Unix administration skills
* Experience in Java, Java Script, Python

Excellent Communication and leadership skills  
* 

  

  

Preferred Technical and Professional Expertise  

* Relevant Product and Industry certifications (eg. ISV Certification)
* Working knowledge of Containers
* Knowledge of virtualization technologies

title: Qradar Suite
description:
Introduction  

As an IBM Cloud Architect in the Technology Expert Labs team you will provide architectural advice and solution strategies in the use of IBM Cloud to address our clients’ strategic business and technical goals. You will primarily collaborate with our clients to lead and develop the target to-be solution architecture that uses IBM Cloud. These projects may include multiple phases from inception, discovery, design, planning, implementation, workload migration, and hand over of the solution to the designated "day 2" operations team. You will provide solution architecture and technical leadership throughout these phases. Solutions are documented as architectures and can include systems, applications, processes and service components all hosted in IBM Cloud and integrated with client on premise systems in accordance with their hybrid cloud journey.  

  

Your Role and Responsibilities  

IBM Technology Expert Labs Security (IBM Security Professional Services) is looking for a Threat Detection and Response solution Consultant with proven record in Security domain and experience with IBM Security products. The candidate will have the ultimate responsibility of delivering the design, deployment, configuration, tuning and knowledge transfer of IBM Security QRadar Suite of products (SIEM, SOAR, EDR, Log Insights, XDR) for Expert Labs customers. This is a customer facing role.  

  

This is an opportunity to work with the delivery of professional services for world leading security platform of IBM QRadar Suite. Be part of a dynamic team delivering professional services to IBM customers. Great opportunity for growth and constantly interesting sets of challenges to solve. IBM Technology Expert Labs Security team thrives on working in dynamic customer facing environments, each offering compelling challenges and exciting opportunities to make a difference.  

  

The consultant will be expected to lead all phases of QRadar Suite design, consultancy and implementation engagements.* Experience working with QRadar Suite System Architecture and Components
* Planning the deployment of IBM Security QRadar Suite Solutions based on best practices
* Integrating QRadar Suite with customer operations including log sources, VA scanners, cloud apps, network management and ticketing systems
* Assisting customers in building key use-cases, operational processes with QRadar Suite ecosystem
* Configuring and troubleshooting QRadar Suite to deliver optimal performance in high volume enterprise customer environments
* Tuning rules, false positive, root cause analysis
* Integrating solution with various systems for Incident enrichment
* Creating custom playbooks. Tuning existing playbooks
* Experience with Python, REST APIs

  

Security Practice and Delivery:* Participate in client meetings to gather and validate market requirements
* Lead clients in requirements gathering, system definition and documentation.
* Participate in project delivery to varying degrees depending on project complexity and geography needs
* Establish demonstrated client relationships in key accounts to help progress the IBM Security Services portfolio
* Achieve billable utilisation targets as assigned


Individual must have a strong interest and expertise in Security in general with preference for threat detection and response. A qualified individual would be familiar with industry blogs, key publications in the field of security and would have full awareness of any recent significant security events.  

  

Required Technical and Professional Expertise  

* At Least 3 years experience required in Threat Management and Response technologies.
* At Least 3 years experience required in IBM QRadar Suite solution architecture, implementation and Upgrade
* Proficient in writing QRadar content creation (Custom rules, regular expressions etc.)
* Demonstrate experience in administration of operating systems (Linux)
* Broad knowledge of security technologies, processes and strategies - SIEM, Cloud, IDS, IPS, and Endpoint technologies
* Good Understanding of Information Security compliance regulations, frameworks, requirements (PCI, SOX, HIPPA)
* Knowledge in understanding threat actors, their methods, patterns, and the application of techniques from detection, through to response including forensics and investigations.
* Hands on Knowledge of Scripting (Python, Bash, Perl)
* Understanding of MITRE ATT&CK Framework
* Experience of working across diverse teams to facilitate solutions on large projects

Understanding of Security Operations in a SOC environment  
* 

  

  

Preferred Technical and Professional Expertise  

* Linux Certification
* Understanding of Redhat OpenShift technology
* Understanding of AWS/IBM Cloud/Azure/Google cloud environments

title: Packager
description:
Introduction  

In this role, you'll work in our IBM Client Innovation Center (CIC), where we deliver deep technical and industry expertise to a wide range of public and private sector clients around the world. These centers offer our clients locally based skills and technical expertise to drive innovation and adoption of new technology  

  

As an Application Package Specialist, you'll help clients in the selection, implementation, and production support of application packaged solutions. You'll gain in-depth consulting skills, business knowledge, and packaged solution expertise to effectively integrate packaged technology into the clients’ business environment. Join us and start your path as a key player to achieve client expected business results and become the expert you want to be.  

  

Your Role and Responsibilities  

* Assists clients in the selection, implementation, and support of SRM (Supplier Relationship Management) for SAP.
* Lead multiple sized projects as team member or lead to implement new functionalities and improve existing functionalities including articulating, analyzing requirements and translating them into effective solutions
* Prepare and conduct Unit Testing and User Acceptance Testing
* Knowledge and experience in implementation planning, fit analysis, configuration, testing, rollout and post-implementation support.
* Experience in working with teams to prioritize work and drive system solutions by clearly articulating business needs

  

Required Technical and Professional Expertise  

* 8-12 Years of SAP functional experience specializing in design and configuration of SAP MM Hana modules.
* Assists clients in the selection, implementation, and support of the SAP Materials Management module with Inventory Management on HANA
* Experience in gathering business requirements, providing conceptual and detailed designs to meet business needs, performing necessary SAP configurations, writing detail specifications for development of custom programs, testing, co-ordination of transports to production and post-go live support
* Should be able to create requirement specifications based on Architecture/Design/Detailing of Processes

  

Preferred Technical and Professional Expertise  

* Proven work experience in WM would be an added advantage.

title: Delivery Consultant
description:
Introduction  

IBM Technology Expert Labs Security (IBM Security Professional Services) is looking for a Threat Detection and Response solution Consultant with proven record in Security domain and experience with IBM Security products. The candidate will have the ultimate responsibility of delivering the design, deployment, configuration, tuning and knowledge transfer of IBM Security QRadar Suite of products (SIEM, SOAR, EDR, Log Insights, XDR) for Expert Labs customers. This is a customer facing role.  

  

Your Role and Responsibilities  

IBM Technology Expert Labs Security (IBM Security Professional Services) is looking for a Threat Detection and Response solution Consultant with proven record in Security domain and experience with IBM Security products. The candidate will have the ultimate responsibility of delivering the design, deployment, configuration, tuning and knowledge transfer of IBM Security QRadar Suite of products (SIEM, SOAR, EDR, Log Insights, XDR) for Expert Labs customers. This is a customer facing role.  

  

This is an opportunity to work with the delivery of professional services for world leading security platform of IBM QRadar Suite. Be part of a dynamic team delivering professional services to IBM customers. Great opportunity for growth and constantly interesting sets of challenges to solve. IBM Technology Expert Labs Security team thrives on working in dynamic customer facing environments, each offering compelling challenges and exciting opportunities to make a difference.  

  

The consultant will be expected to lead all phases of QRadar Suite design, consultancy and implementation engagements.* Experience working with QRadar Suite (SIEM, SOAR, EDR, Log Insights, XDR) System Architecture and Components
* Planning the deployment of IBM Security QRadar Suite Solutions based on best practices
* Integrating QRadar Suite with customer operations including log sources, VA scanners, cloud apps, network management and ticketing systems
* Assisting customers in building key use-cases, operational processes with QRadar Suite ecosystem
* Conducting security investigations into customer incidents using QRadar Suite
* Configuring and troubleshooting QRadar Suite to deliver optimal performance in high volume enterprise customer environments
* Tuning rules, false positive, root cause analysis
* Performing maturity assessment of QRadar Suite deployments of customer deployments
* Integrating solution with various systems for Incident enrichment
* Running process design workshop with customers
* Creating custom playbooks. Tuning existing playbooks
* Experience with React JS, Carbon Design
* Experience with Python, REST APIs

**Security Practice and Delivery:*** Participate in client meetings to gather and validate market requirements
* Provide assistance with proposals, statements of work, and provide peer review for other members
* Lead clients in requirements gathering, system definition and documentation.
* Participate in project delivery to varying degrees depending on project complexity and geography needs
* Establish demonstrated client relationships in key accounts to help progress the IBM Security Services portfolio
* Achieve billable utilisation targets as assigned


Individual must have a strong interest and expertise in Security in general with preference for threat detection and response. A qualified individual would be familiar with industry blogs, key publications in the field of security and would have full awareness of any recent significant security events.  

  

Required Technical and Professional Expertise  

* At Least 7 years experience required in Threat Management and Response technologies.
* At Least 7 years experience required in IBM QRadar Suite solution architecture, design and implementation
* Demonstrate experience in administration of operating systems (Linux and Windows)
* Understanding of AI-embedded capabilities in IBM Security QRadar Suite
* Broad knowledge of security technologies, processes and strategies - SIEM, Cloud, IDS, IPS, and Endpoint technologies
* Good understanding of Information Security compliance regulations, frameworks, requirements (PCI, SOX, HIPPA)
* Knowledge in understanding threat actors, their methods, patterns, and the application of techniques from detection, through to response including forensics and investigations.
* Understanding of Redhat OpenShift technology
* Deep understanding of MITRE ATT&CK Framework
* Advanced ability to take business problems and design cognitive intelligence approaches to address priority use cases
* Experience of working across diverse teams to facilitate solutions on large projects
* Understanding of Security Operations in a SOC environment
* Understanding of AWS/IBM Cloud/Azure/Google cloud environments

  

Preferred Technical and Professional Expertise  

* Redhat OpenShift Certification
* AWS Certification
* Industry certifications like CISSP would be added advantage
* Relevant SANS Training

  

About Business UnitIBM has a global presence, operating in more than 175 countries with a broad-based geographic distribution of revenue. The company’s Global Markets organization is a strategic sales business unit that manages IBM’s global footprint, working closely with dedicated country-based operating units to serve clients locally. These country teams have client relationship managers who lead integrated teams of consultants, solution specialists and delivery professionals to enable clients’ growth and innovation. By complementing local expertise with global experience and digital capabilities, IBM builds deep and broad-based client relationships. This local management focus fosters speed in supporting clients, addressing new markets and making investments in emerging opportunities. Additionally, the Global Markets organization serves clients with expertise in their industry as well as through the products and services that IBM and partners supply. IBM is also expanding its reach to new and existing clients through digital marketplaces.
